programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: El equipo sospecha que un par de asesinos trabajan juntos, después de destapar dos cuerpos aparentemente no relacionados entre sí.

programme.desc: El equipo se apresura a buscar una relación entre dos familias, una asesinada y la otra secuestrada.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: El equipo está detrás de un cirujano que hace amputaciones innecesarias.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: Policía bueno, policía malo
programme.desc: Cuando el cadáver de un marine aparece al otro lado del mundo, la investigación obliga a Ziva a desenterrar un capítulo enterrado de su vida.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: Código de conducta
programme.desc: Cuando un marine conocido por sus bromas pesadas es encontrado muerto en la víspera de Halloween, el equipo del NCIS descubre que las bromas "inocentes" de la víctima pueden haber inspirado una venganza macabra.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: Fugitivos y consuelo
programme.desc: Una investigación de asesinato lleva a Gibbs y al equipo a hacer de consejero familiar de su antiguo mentor, Mike Franks, con la esperanza de evitar un sangriento conflicto internacional.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: Fin del juego
programme.desc: Con la ayuda del equipo, Vance se enfrenta a sus demonios mientras descubre una compleja relación con un asesino que pone en peligro a toda su familia.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Por la comunidad
programme.desc: Erin y Anthony intentan evitar la deportación de la activista comunitaria Coryna Garza (Judy Reyes), quien no es ciudadana, y Frank debe decidir si el NYPD participará en la redada de alto perfil de los Marshals de EE. UU. contra una pandilla local.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): El delator
programme.desc: Mientras Frank se enfrenta a un denunciante de la policía de Nueva York que afirma tener pruebas de abuso de poder en la organización, Danny y Báez investigan el caso de una mujer que fue atropellada por un coche en circunstancias sospechosas.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Culpable por asociación
programme.desc: Cuando un testigo clave en el caso de Danny es asesinado justo antes de testificar, Erin enfurece a Danny al pedirle ayuda a Anthony (Steve Schrippa) para encontrar al asesino.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Negocios personales
programme.desc: Después de que Emily Harrison (Danielle Savre) le dice a Danny y Baez que teme que su ex novio abusivo vuelva a comportarse de la misma manera con su nueva novia, Emily se convierte en la principal sospechosa cuando él es asesinado.

programme.desc: El equipo sigue la pista a un recluso fugitivo que cose la boca a sus víctimas.

programme.title: Party Down South
programme.desc: Now that the sage smoke has finally cleared the air in the house, the roommates hope that Tiffany and Lauren's boyfriends won't bring new drama when they come to visit. Bubba and Destin struggle to stay focused on their mission.

programme.title: Party Down South
programme.desc: The trip to Miami gets off to a great start until the sun goes down and shots get poured. When Mattie goes missing, Don "Daddy" Johnson is on the case. Back at the house, Lyle makes a life-changing decision.

programme.title: Party Down South
programme.desc: Lyle's girlfriend, Santana, comes to visit but little does she know her life is going to change forever. All of the roommates come together to plan the most perfect marriage proposal for Lyle.

programme.title: Party Down South
programme.desc: Lyle gets an answer for his proposal and the gang throws Mattie an 80s skating birthday party. Tiffany learns some troubling news about Hannah's boyfriend, Cody. Martha redecorates the boys' bedroom.

programme.title: My Big Redneck Family
programme.desc: After losing his pet fish, Brody decides to become vegan much to Doug's dismay. The guys help Mason deal with a broken heart the only way they know how, while Jared takes a stab at the corporate world.

programme.title: My Big Redneck Family
programme.desc: Aimee tests out her new taxidermy style on a hog for Jared while Tammy and Tommy face a dreaded awkward moment with Hunter. Doug tries to woo Wendy with oysters only to have the plan backfire.

programme.title: My Big Redneck Family
programme.desc: Michelle deals with Jared's friend overstaying his welcome while Chris and Aimee face a moral dilemma with Morgan. Doug and Wendy have their hands full with Presley who has started mimicking what they say...cursing included!

programme.title: My Big Redneck Family
programme.desc: Doug takes a leap of faith and tries dance lessons with Wendy while Jared is faced with a cultural clash at his new temp job, and Christian is having girl problems.

programme.title: My Big Redneck Family
programme.desc: Doug and Wendy meet with a marriage counselor who assigns them intimacy "homework", Tammy and Tommy go on a juice cleanse and the family takes an IQ test to find out who's the smartest one.

programme.title: My Big Redneck Family
programme.desc: Jared and Tommy get some quality guy time in but it may be a little too much for Jared to handle. Chris finds out that Christian has a boyfriend and invites him over for a family barbeque.

programme.title: My Big Redneck Family
programme.desc: Chris is at war with some teenage kids who are tearing up his lawn while Jared panics after pawning Michelle's grandmother's necklace. Tommy is worried that Hunter is growing up too fast and Doug questions Wendy's sexuality.

programme.title: My Big Redneck Family
programme.desc: Doug does some retail therapy and makes a very expensive purchase that doesn't go over too well with Wendy. Jared is determined to have a pool in his backyard and Tommy & Tammy host a couple of fans at their house for the weekend.

programme.title: My Big Redneck Family
programme.desc: Chris and Aimee face a big challenge by trying to bond with their kids while Doug can't recall the crazy night he and Wendy had at the bar. Jared befriends a blind man and tests what it's like to be blind for 24 hours.

programme.title: My Big Redneck Family
programme.desc: Brody loses a tooth but when the tooth fairy fails to deliver, Doug has to step up to the plate. Michelle leaves for a night and leaves a desperate Jared on diaper duty while Aimee tries to convince Chris to marry her.

programme.title: My Big Redneck Family
programme.desc: The guys try to toughen up Mason and Brody's survival skills while Tommy has his acting debut in his first film.

programme.title: My Big Redneck Family
programme.desc: Jared finishes his last temp job before hunting scene and finally changes a diaper. Tammy and Tommy experiment in the bedroom, and Doug may finally get some action the bedroom.

programme.title: My Big Redneck Family
programme.desc: The Clampets are settled back home and facing a whole new set of challenges. Mason has found young love and is putting Chris and Aimee's parenting skills to the test.

programme.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge
programme.desc: Steve Austin kicks off season three with eight badasses who will go head to head in three bust ass challenges. The last man standing will earn the right to take on the Skullbuster for a chance to win $10,000.

programme.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge
programme.desc: Steve Austin invites eight hardcore female athletes to visit the ranch to battle through Snatch, Water Logged and The Crate before one competitor gets her shot at the Skullbuster and $10,000.

programme.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge
programme.desc: Eight tough-as-nails athletes are ready to throw down. But will they have what it takes to get through Trench Warfare, Pole Dancer and Chain Gang?

programme.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge
programme.desc: Eight rough and tough female athletes must face off in Trench Warfare, Pole Dancer and Chain Gang before they get a chance at the Skullbuster and a shot at $10,000 if they can beat the current benchmark time.

programme.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge
programme.desc: Eight male athletes compete in Summit, High & Dry and Cranked for a chance to win $10,000. Who will outlast his competition and challenge the toughest course in America?

programme.title: Redención
programme.desc: Jason Statham interpreta a un cobrador que trabaja para un jefe de la mafia local en este thriller de acción de alto octanaje. Afectado por el asesinato de un amigo y consumido por deseos de venganza, se sumerge en un mundo de violencia.

programme.title: El crimen del Padre Amaro
programme.desc: La política y las pasiones sexuales amenazan con corromper a un joven sacerdote recién ordenado en un pequeño pueblo mexicano.

programme.title: Ladrón que roba ladrón
programme.desc: A un par de ladrones profesionales se les complica su plan para robar a un millonario, después de que los mejores miembros de su equipo habitual, abandonan el plan. Los ladrones se verán forzados a contratar a novatos para completar el trabajo.

programme.title: Ladrones
programme.desc: Fernando Colunga y Eduardo Yáñez lideran las risas como los Robin Hoods modernos en esta tremendamente entretenida secuela del gran éxito "Ladrón que roba a ladrón".

programme.title: No eres tú, soy yo
programme.desc: Después de la ruptura de su reciente matrimonio, Javier se encuentra en una depresión de la que ni siquiera un psiquiatra puede ayudarlo a salir. Sin embargo, la esperanza está en camino en la forma improbable de sus exnovias.

programme.title: Tod@s caen
programme.desc: Tras su éxito en la taquillera pelicula No Manches Frida 2, Omar Chaparro y Martha Higared llegan a la gran pantalla con la divertidísima comedia romántica TODOS CAEN.

programme.title: El infierno
programme.desc: Benny ha sido deportado de los Estados Unidos a México, que está siendo destrozado por las guerras de los carteles de droga. Luego se involucra en el negocio del narcotráfico y comienza a subir de rango.

programme.title: Darkness
programme.desc: Anna Paquin protagoniza este thriller en el que caracteriza a una adolescente cuya vida cambia cuando su familia se muda a una nueva casa con secretos. Poco después una serie de sucesos sobrenaturales desencadenarán el mal que habita en la casa.

programme.title: Carrie (2002)
programme.desc: Angela Bettis protagoniza esta adaptación de la clásica historia de terror de Stephen King. Carrie es una chica tímida con poderes telequinéticos y cuando sus torturadores la someten a un acto de humillación, todos aprenderán una lección mortal.

programme.title: San Valentín sangriento
programme.desc: Hace 20 años, en un trágico accidente en el Día de San Valentín, cinco mineros murieron cuando sus supervisores dejaron su cargo para ir a un baile. Después de un año de la catástrofe, el único superviviente regresa al pueblo con una sangrienta venganza.

programme.title: Supernova: el fin del universo
programme.desc: En los confines del espacio, la tripulación de una nave desvelará un secreto antes de que una supernova haga estallar la galaxia. James Spader, Angela Bassett, Peter Facinelli y Robert Forster protagonizan este thriller de ciencia ficción.

programme.title: Sumergidos
programme.desc: En lo que debería ser una misión de rescate rutinaria, el submarino USS Tiger Shark encuentra a tres sobrevivientes del ataque de un submarino. Pronto, los visitantes parecen desencadenar una serie de sucesos escalofriantes y de otro mundo.

programme.title: Event Horizon: La nave de la muerte
programme.desc: En 2047, un equipo de astronautas se embarca en una misión para recuperar una nave espacial. Sin embargo, esta simple tarea los conducirá a algo mucho más aterrador de lo que imaginaban.

programme.title: Alucinaciones del pasado
programme.desc: Un veterano de la guerra de Vietnam, ahora trabajador del correo de Nueva York, enfrenta recuerdos traumáticos y alucinaciones. Con la ayuda de su nueva novia, lucha para mantenerse sano mientras su mente fluctúa entre la realidad y el delirio.

programme.title: Four Rooms
programme.desc: Año Nuevo en el Hotel Mon Signor. Es la primera noche en el trabajo de Ted, el botones, y los huéspedes inusuales del hotel lo pondrán en aprietos escandalosos. Una noche alocada con un gran elenco de estrellas.

programme.title: El regreso de la tribu Brady
programme.desc: Mike (Gary Cole) planea una fiesta de aniversario, pero el primer marido de Carol (Shelley Long), Roy (Tim Matheson), aparece y sacude el árbol genealógico. Roy lleva a Carol a Hawái, y los Brady los persiguen en busca de diversión, sol y aventura.

programme.title: Verano de locura
programme.desc: Carl Reiner (The Jerk) dirige esta historia sobre un padre de familia que toma unas vacaciones normales y alquila una finca de verano en Florida.

programme.title: Partes privadas
programme.desc: Partes privadas cuenta la increíble transformación de Howard Stern, de cerebrito a superestrella de los medios.

programme.title: El dictador
programme.desc: Los creadores y las estrellas de Borat traen esta asombrosa comedia sobre lo que pasa cuando el peor dictador del mundo llega a los Estados Unidos ¡Prepárate para llorar de risa con esta comedia delirante y bochornosamente divertida!

programme.title: Último viaje a Las Vegas
programme.desc: Cuatro mejores amigos de toda la vida van a Las Vegas para dejar de portarse como adultos de su edad y revivir sus días de gloria. Al llegar, se dan cuenta de que las décadas transformaron Sin City y pusieron a prueba su amistad de manera impensada.

programme.title: Los tres amigos
programme.desc: Las locuras de tres actores hollywoodenses (Steve Martin, Chevy Chase y Martin Short) que enfrentan a un grupo de bandidos mexicanos. ¿Qué podría salir mal?

programme.title: El dictador

programme.title: Hour Of The Gun
programme.desc: Director John Sturges presents a reworking of the Wyatt Earp/Doc Holliday legend and the struggle for political control of Tombstone, with a marvelous trio of antagonists: James Garner as Earp, Jason Robards as Holliday, and Robert Ryan as Clanton.

programme.title: Sabata
programme.desc: Get ready for fast-paced, explosive action as Lee Van Cleef stars as Sabata, the mysterious, steely-eyed gunslinger who, after he discovers the masterminds behind an elaborate bank heist, imposes his bullet-laced brand of justice on a guilty town.

programme.title: Shane
programme.desc: A retired gunfighter, now a drifter determined to establish a peaceful life, comes to the aid of a homestead family threatened by a land baron and his hired gun.

programme.title: Doc
programme.desc: Stacy Keach, Haris Yulin, and Faye Dunaway give riveting performances in this controversial and myth-shattering reexamination of the darker side of gunslinger Doc Holliday and the actions that led to the infamous showdown in Tombstone, Arizona.

programme.title: Duel at Diablo

programme.title: The Maury Show
programme.desc: Rhonda is positive that John is the father of her child. Even John’s mother agrees with her! Then, Kim and Heather used to be best friends. But that was before Rick left her for Heather. But Kim is sure that Rick fathered her baby. What is the truth?

programme.title: The Maury Show
programme.desc: Charlotte and Tasheun bonded over their children’s mutual father from a photo album, Brandon, but will the DNA test further confirm this? Then, will Tanya prove that her baby Craig III is the son of Craig Jr.?

programme.title: The Maury Show
programme.desc: Elizabeth swears that a psychic told her and her whole family that her son Nehemiah didn't father Ja'Quasia's baby. But Ja'Quasia doesn't believe in a crystal ball. Then, Heidi and Tabbi claim AJ fathered their kids, but AJ only believes Tabbi!

programme.title: The Maury Show

programme.title: The Maury Show
programme.desc: Teen mom Casie is dead set on proving Casey is the dad. Is Dirk the father of Brooke’s baby? Which brother fathered Miranda’s baby? Brandon denies both of Me'Chelle's kids but even his mother is on Me'Chelle's side!

programme.title: The Maury Show
programme.desc: Kiley suspects that her husband Eli is cheating with her mother! Tanika is done with her fiancé’s lies. Plus, Daysha suspects that her man wants to leave her for a more “experienced” woman.

programme.title: The Maury Show: My Wife Had a Threesome. Who's the Dad?
programme.desc: Toni’s fiancée is a tattoo artist and wants to know if he’s been making his mark in bed with other women. Is Sandy’s fiancé cheating with married women? Is Juanita's fiancé a cheater?

programme.title: The Maury Show
programme.desc: Kisha wants to know why she found her sister Kim and her husband Shannon in bed together watching The Maury Show. She also found a photo of Shannon on Kim's phone! Then, Joe's wife Melissa caught him sending a racy photo to her best friend Brandy!

programme.title: The Maury Show: My Wife Had a Threesome. Who's the Dad?
programme.desc: Keith is terrified that Chyna cheated and their daughter may not be his. Could Keith’s best friend be the real father? Will the DNA results quash Omar's denials about fathering Jennifer’s child?

programme.title: The Maury Show
programme.desc: Billy is convinced that Heather is having a secret affair with her best friend Tara. Then, Jennifer found a shocking message on Facebook about her husband Skky. What happens when she sees what Maury caught on tape while Skky was in the green room!

programme.title: The Maury Show
programme.desc: Darius already took a DNA test to prove if he is the father of Timisha's baby, but she thinks it was tainted! Then, 4-month pregnant Brittney wants her boyfriend Bruce to admit that he's the father. Later, did Caitlin have Eric's baby?

programme.title: The Maury Show
programme.desc: Tiara wants De'Ron to admit that he fathered her baby! He claims the proof lies in fingers: his fiancée Diamond's baby has two pinky fingers like him, but Tiara's baby doesn't! Later, did Michelle have a baby with Mitchell's brother-in-law Shane?

programme.title: The Maury Show
programme.desc: Michael says that he and Britny didn’t make love for nearly long enough for her to get pregnant. Shekeita and her sister Natasha are here to prove that Kieary is the real father of Shekeita’s baby.

programme.title: The Maury Show: I Cheated With My Daughter's Girlfriend
programme.desc: Toni, Quintin, and his mom return for a DNA test! This time they’ll wonder if Toni cheated! Did Jenny's husband or his friend fathered her child? Will Vivian end her 30-year search for her son?

programme.title: The Maury Show
programme.desc: The wedding is already planned, but Autumn caught Antoine cheating with her best friend of 10 years and suspects he may be detailing cars for sex. Then Ricky confessed to his fiancée Chelsea that he had sex with her step-mom Tecki, but is he lying?

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Después de que el sospechoso fuera declarado culpable de incendio premeditado y asesinato, mantuvo su inocencia pero fue sentenciado a 25 años de prisión.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Después de ser admitido en el hospital con una hemorragia inexplicable, Chad Shelton de 11 meses llega a fallecer. Los investigadores y científicos buscan desesperadamente una causa cuando otros de la misma casa se enferman.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: La víctima había sido apuñalada más de treinta veces y la escena del crimen estaba inundada de sangre. Cerca de su cabeza, la policía descubrió un distintivo botón con hebras de hilo todavía unidas.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Un asesino en serie andaba suelto y la policía tenía que encontrarlo antes de que atacara nuevamente. Su pista más prometedora era inusual: una huella dactilar sangrienta en el cuerpo de una de las víctimas.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En el 2000, Christina Sanoubane fue asesinada en su departamento de Cedar Rapids después de dejar a su abusivo novio. Hay pistas en la escena: huellas sangrientas y ADN del kit de violación de la víctima.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Matan a un hombre joven en un misterioso accidente vehicular, pero la evidencia en la escena lleva a los investigadores a creer que no fue un accidente. La ciencia forense reveló lo que pasó realmente y la verdad es devastadora para tres familias.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: La investigación del secuestro de la esposa de un prominente banquero llevó a la policía a una persecución inútil.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Se encuentra a Nancy Newman y a sus dos hijas que fueron brutalmente asesinadas. La escena del crimen no tiene escasez de pruebas, pero los investigadores no pueden encontrar un vínculo concluyente con su principal sospechoso.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Con un pie en el crimen

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Una mujer joven es apuñalada más de 100 veces. El asesino deja atrás el ADN, pero los investigadores deben jugar al gato y al ratón para obtener el ADN de un sospechoso que coincida.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Cuando una niña de 9 años desaparece, la policía y los voluntarios pasan semanas buscándola.

programme.desc: Cuando el jefe de cocina de un restaurante histórico de Filadelfia fue encontrado muerto, los investigadores entrevistaron a los sospechosos habituales: familiares, amigos y compañeros de trabajo.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Cuando Rosemary Anderson es encontrada muerta a un lado de la carretera, su novio se convierte en el principal sospechoso.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En 1987, se descubrieron un cráneo humano y algunos huesos en un campamento de niños exploradores cerca de Farmington, Missouri. La reconstrucción facial ayuda a los investigadores en este caso.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En 2003, Tiffany Rowell y tres de sus amigas fueron brutalmente asesinadas en la adinerada área de Clear Lake, Texas.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Una modelo aspirante apareció muerta y el sospechoso principal fue su novio. Cuando finalmente se le dio el visto bueno, los investigadores tuvieron que buscar más profundamente para poder encontrar al responsable.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Una pastilla amarga para tragar
programme.desc: Se cuenta la historia de la bombero Michelle Baker. Después de conocer al Dr. Maynard Muntzing, quedó embarazada de él. Después de esta noticia, ella se enfermaba siempre que estaban juntos.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Un caso inusual involucrando la violación y muerte de Nancy DePriest en 1988. Después de que Chris Ochoa confesara, el caso fue cerrado. 8 años después, Achim Marino confesó al mismo crimen.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En algún momento durante una fiesta de Navidad en el vecindario, Melissa Brannen, de cinco años, desapareció. Los investigadores recurrieron a la ciencia forense para ayudarlos a ver lo que se perdieron los testigos.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Noticia de última hora

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: KC’s living the high school dream. The basketball team made it to the provincial finals, the Sports Awards Gala is coming up, and he finally has a mentor who gets him – Coach Carson.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Emma and Kelly make a pit stop at Degrassi while on their Cross Country Bike Adventure raising awareness for their Re-Cycle project. Combining the great outdoors with her sexy boyfriend, Emma’s convinced she’s destined for the best summer ever.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: It’s been a tough year for Peter. Mia’s departure, a brief meth problem, and the serious downgrade from lead singer to roadie.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Anya is more determined than ever to convince Sav they should be together – even if he is bringing family-friend and arranged-marriage-bride Farrah to the Spring Formal.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Post-KC, Clare’s social life consists of building props for Declan’s musical and reading every book in the “Fortnight” vampire series. But when Clare has a sexy vampire dream about Declan, she’s shocked by her inner fantasy life.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Riley’s completed anger management and has been named ‘Degrassi’s most eligible bachelor’. He’s been keeping his true feelings about guys under wraps – but he’s not sure he wants to anymore.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Holly J and Declan are closer than ever. They’ve made it through the year, Holly J’s applied for internships all over the city, and with exams almost done, all they need to worry about is Declan’s musical.

programme.title: Meet the Ancestors
programme.desc: A team examines the remains of two crouched bodies found in the isolated Somerset community of Bleadon, where modern DNA testing reveals a picture of the arduous life of iron age farmers.

programme.title: The Mystery of Rome's X Tomb
programme.desc: Dr Michael Scott investigates the secrets of a tomb containing over 2,000 bodies in one of the catacombs of Rome.

programme.title: Deadly Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Steve is going large as he focuses on the biggest animals to have ever walked the earth. In his dino-den, he starts by meeting the Argentinosaurus, an animal so large that even its poo was deadly.

programme.title: Deadly Dinosaurs
programme.desc: The Jurassic was home to the most vicious and violent predators the world has ever seen. To survive, herbivores had to fight back. Steve Backshall goes on a mission to track down the deadliest of all dinosaur defenders.

programme.title: Deadly Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Steve tries to chomp through a car like a T-rex, wield an axe like an Allosaurus and hitch a ride in Britain's biggest tank to showcase the might of a Spinosaurus.

programme.title: Deadly Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Steve gets freaky on a mission to find the weirdest dinosaur ever. He kick-starts with a Gigantoraptor, an 8 metre tall giant that laid the biggest eggs in history.

programme.title: Deadly Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Steve discovers just what it takes to be a terror from the skies. He straps himself into one of Britain's fastest wind tunnels where he goes head to head against Microraptor.

programme.title: Deadly Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Steve travels to new depths as he discovers just what it takes to be an aquatic terror. His quest sees him rocket through water in spectacular style, just like an Opthalmosaurus.

programme.title: Deadly Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Steve's on a mission to find dinosaurs that have something a little special: fearsome killers, with incredible abilities! Get ready for a sensory sensation! His quest sees him race in the dark like a Troodon.

programme.title: Deadly Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Steve goes on an undercover mission to unearth the sneakiest dinosaurs that were far deadlier than they first appeared.

programme.title: Deadly Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Steve Backshall is on the hunt for the most deadly animals to have ever walked the earth, dinosaurs. Steve goes on a mission to uncover what was deadlier than the dinosaurs, from monsoons and super-sized sandstorms to ballistic bacteria and gory gas.

programme.title: Deadly Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Steve Backshall looks back at the most awesome experiments over the series and chooses his highlights.

programme.title: Horizon
programme.desc: Are sparrows and blackbirds the direct descendents of a vicious group of dinosaurs including the velociraptor?

programme.title: Horizon
programme.desc: Exploring Mongolia's Gobi Desert to determine whether dinosaurs exist in the present as birds. It is one of the harshest places on Earth with the biggest dinosaur graveyard.

programme.title: How to Build a Dinosaur
programme.desc: Dinosaurs died out 65 million years ago and we have hardly ever found a complete skeleton. So how do we turn a pile of broken bones into a dinosaur exhibit? Dr Alice Roberts finds out how the experts put skeletons back together.

programme.title: Walking with Monsters: Life Before Dinosaurs
programme.desc: The evolution of the predators who lived 550 million years ago, and how the first amphibians migrated from sea to land.

programme.title: Walking with Monsters: Life Before Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Three hundred million years ago, the forests were ruled by insects. This was a world in which giant dragonflies battled with two-foot-wide spiders.

programme.title: Walking with Monsters: Life Before Dinosaurs
programme.desc: On the supercontinent Pangea, early therapsids, creatures more similar to mammals than reptiles, fight for survival alongside other animals. In the carboniferous swamps, insects and arthropods take over and grow into giants.

programme.title: Lost Worlds: Vanished Lives
programme.desc: David travels the world to unravel some of the wonders and puzzles of palaeontology. But how do you find the world's oldest and rarest reptile?

programme.title: Lost Worlds: Vanished Lives
programme.desc: Could pterodactyls fly? And why did trilobites have such good eyes? David Attenborough investigates the secret lives of animals from the past, as told in the fossil record.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who: The Sea Devils
programme.desc: The Doctor is captured by the Sea Devils and taken to their undersea base. There, he tries to make peace with the creatures, but his efforts are thwarted by the Navy.

programme.title: Classic Doctor Who: The Sea Devils
programme.desc: The Sea Devils come to the surface and attack the Naval base. The Doctor is forced to create a machine that will awaken the creatures across the entire world.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Three Doctors
programme.desc: Attacked by an antimatter creature the Doctor sends an SOS to the Time Lords.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Three Doctors
programme.desc: The Doctor and Jo pass through the black hole to the desolate world of antimatter.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Three Doctors
programme.desc: The Doctors are trapped in the universe of antimatter where they confront Omega.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Three Doctors
programme.desc: Omega intends to escape his antimatter world but needs the Doctors to take his place.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Carnival of Monsters
programme.desc: The Doctor is free to roam space and time again, but having planned to visit Metebelis Three, the Doctor and Jo actually find themselves stowaways aboard a ship in the 1920s, heading for Bombay.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Carnival of Monsters
programme.desc: The Doctor and Jo realise that they are actually trapped in a loop on a miniaturised version of Earth in which the other ship passengers endlessly repeat their actions.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Carnival of Monsters
programme.desc: Having escaped from the ship, the Doctor and Jo find themselves stuck inside the workings of a giant machine. Can they find their way out?

programme.title: Doctor Who: Carnival of Monsters
programme.desc: The Doctor is reunited with the TARDIS and now full size, but Jo is still trapped within the machine. When the Doctor meets the operators of the Scope he learms that Jo is in grave danger.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Frontier in Space
programme.desc: The Doctor and Jo land on a spaceship in the far future as it is attacked by Ogrons, which the human crew see as Draconians. The Doctor and Jo are taken to Earth as spies.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Frontier in Space
programme.desc: Neither the humans nor the Draconians are willing to believe the Doctor and Jo's story that someone is deliberately attempting to provoke a war between Earth and Draconia.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Frontier in Space
programme.desc: Accused of being a spy, the Doctor is sentenced to imprisonment on the Moon while Jo is taken into the custody of an old enemy.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Frontier in Space
programme.desc: The Doctor and Jo are the Master's prisoners. In a bid to escape, the Doctor makes a dangerous spacewalk.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Frontier in Space
programme.desc: On Draconia, the Doctor reveals the Master's plan to provoke war to the Draconian Emperor. But the Master escapes, taking Jo as a hostage.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Frontier in Space
programme.desc: The Doctor leads a mission to the Ogron home world to apprehend the Master and rescue Jo. But the Master is in league with some old enemies of the Doctor.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Planet of the Daleks
programme.desc: Injured by an Orgron gun, the Doctor asks the Time Lords to send the TARDIS after the Daleks. Leaving him asleep, Jo goes to explore the planet Spirodon.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Planet of the Daleks
programme.desc: The Doctor recovers from his coma and befriends a Thal expedition but is captured by the Daleks and taken to their base. Then a second Thal expedition arrives with terrible news.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Planet of the Daleks
programme.desc: In Dalek city, the Doctor breaks out of his prison cell and joins forces with the Thals. With the Daleks in pursuit, the Doctor is forced to improvise a daring escape plan.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Planet of the Daleks
programme.desc: The Doctor and the Thals escape from the Dalek city and the Doctor is delighted to find that Jo is alive. The Daleks are preparing a deadly bacteria to kill all life on the planet.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Planet of the Daleks
programme.desc: Desperate to prevent the Daleks from releasing their plague, the Doctor, Jo and the Thals infiltrate the Dalek base. But the Daleks detect the intruders!

programme.title: Doctor Who: Planet of the Daleks
programme.desc: A force of ten thousand Daleks are coming to life below the surface of Spiridon. The Doctor and the Thals must find a way to defeat the Daleks before they invade the galaxy.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Green Death
programme.desc: In Wales, a dead miner is found glowing green. UNIT investigates and Jo empathizes with the environmentalism of Cliff Jones who is opposing the pollution from Global Chemicals.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Green Death
programme.desc: Investigating the old mine workings, Jo and the miner, Bert, become trapped beneath the surface when the lift is sabotaged. Bert touches some green slime and becomes infected.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Green Death
programme.desc: The Doctor and Jo discover the mine’s terrible secret. Global Chemicals’ managing director, Stevens is determined that they won’t live to reveal what they have learnt.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Green Death
programme.desc: The Brigadier attempts to seal the giant maggots in the mine with explosives, but this only results in the creatures burrowing to the surface.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Green Death
programme.desc: Captain Mike Yates is taken over by the supercomputer, BOSS and ordered to kill the Doctor. Cliff and Jo are trapped by the maggots as UNIT launch their attack.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: An English Bulldog who is destroying her owner's house and aggressive towards their other dog; Howie Mandel's chihuahua is aggressive towards him and his wife.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A border collie/greyhound mix with an aversion to other dogs; a woman tries to tame her dog's nervousness; a large dog with too much energy.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar helps Casey Anderson, of "Expedition Wild," and his wife, actress Missi Pyle, with their dogs; a pit bull's fears make him aggressive.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar joins forces with Jennifer McCarthy to examine the nature of wolf-dogs, the result of the cross-breeding of wolves and domestic dogs.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar helps actress Rhona Mitra curb her bulldog's violent tendencies; a newly-wed couples Chihuahua assumes dominance over their sheltie mix.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar Millan investigates the case of a bulldog named Bella who has become aggressive ever since her owner's five-month rehab stint.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A professional dog groomer reaches out to Cesar for help with three of her toughest clients; Cesar helps a couple with their head-strong pitbull.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Puppy mills produce millions of dogs; Ceaser works with an animal rights group to rescue and rehabilitate some pups.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar Millan helps Suzie Dove Miles, who has recently adopted a Doberman who is fearful of literally everything.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Family dogs brawl with each other; a dog torments a child; a five-legged miniature pinscher has an aggressive attitude.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar attempts to introduce Roscoe, an agoraphobic Akita who is too scared to leave the house and garden and has never been for a walk, to the outside world.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A Weimaraner eats everything in sight; a yellow Lab's excess energy is expressed destructively; an Australian shepherd is unable to socialize with other dogs.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Three canines with issues at a dog-friendly ad agency office; a border collie mix becomes excited and unresponsive to commands when in her owner's truck.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Velvet Revolver drummer Matt Sorum's French bulldog goes crazy at the sight of other dogs; Cesar helps a former therapy dog with aggression issues.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Two different young men both have a bad habit of missing their court dates. Looking over their files, Dog senses that they have another trait in common, both are a little too tied to their mothers.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog's target today has a history of violence, and apparently plans to re-locate without notifying the proper authorities. Unfortunately the team is missing a key player, Duane Lee is MIA today, distracted by his new lady love.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and Duane Lee can't agree about what role Duane Lee should have in the family business. But the family comes together as they set out to hunt a chronic violator with an open warrant and a wife who has an odd request for Dog.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog has dropped Duane Lee from the team. When Leland confronts Dog and Beth about the decision, tempers flare. But they have to come together to answer a cry for help from a mother who feels that the safest place for her daughter is jail.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Cecily has graduated from High School, and Dog believes the time is right to show her what the family business is all about. The rough and tumble world of bounty hunting is very different from the all-girls private school she attended.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: This one is close to home. Dog's target on today's hunt is the cousin of Kali, Garry Boy's caregiver. In addition, she has a reputation as a brawler. With Duane Lee still missing from the team, Baby Lyssa decides she will step up in this hunt.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: In an attempt to bring the team back together, Dog recruits his pastor, Tim Storey, to be the peacemaker. As Dog begins his hunt for a young man who has trouble showing up at court, Tim has his own mission--convince Duane Lee to meet with him.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: With Duane Lee back on the team, the rift in the Chapman clan appears over. But will time heal this wound? As the family heads out for the seedier side of Honolulu in search of an erotic dancer, we will find out if the wound is truly healed.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: When can a bounty hunt also be a date? When Dog and Beth decide to ride in the same SUV as they pursue a runaway fugitive, will their different approaches to the investigation lead to a capture and romance?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: When an alleged abuser goes on, the lame Dog gathers the team to bring him in. As the leads grow colder, Dog's determination only grows stronger. Finally, a hot lead comes in and Dog sets the trap for his prey.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and company head to the Big Island in pursuit of two courthouse no-shows, only to find that one of them appears to be posting status updates from Southern California.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: The cameras are turned around, as we get a tour of life "behind the scenes" on Dog the Bounty Hunter. Using interviews with Dog and the posse, the TV crew, and never before seen footage, this is one of most revealing and heartfelt episodes of the series.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: This fugitive spells trouble for Dog in today's hunt. When the leads grow cold, it's the US Postal Service to the rescue as a mail carrier lends a helping hand. Dog's team surrounds the suspected safe house and silently awaits their prey.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Today's case involves a Samoan, so Dog knows that the runner's close-knit kinfolk holds the keys to bringing him in. Dog's plan is to convince the family that everyone is best served if the fugitive mans up and takes care of business.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog's target for today was once an upstanding member of his community. Now with no home, no job, and the law on his trail, this middle-aged exile from middle-class society is using the cold end of an ice pipe to soothe his troubled soul.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: New series focusing on the tumultuous home and professional life of bounty hunter Dwayne "Dog" Chapman, and his partner and wife Beth. In the first episode, Dog and team chase Floyd Chapman (no relation), a heavily tattooed bail jumper.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: In Hawaii, Dog sets off from Honolulu to Kona to help his son Leland with some of his fugitives. First, a stop at Leland's boxing gym to warm up for their day of hunting with a quick sparring session and some father-and-son time together.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog decides to liven things up with a competition. He and Beth will hunt for one fugitive, while Leland and Justin chase another. The winner will be the duo that captures its fugitive first. Will Dog keep bragging rights as the Best Bounty Hunter in

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Once a criminal himself, Dog knows how it feels to be hunted. In this episode, Dog and the team delve into the depths of Honolulu's Chinatown as they search for a young Samoan girl who's gone down the wrong path. After a frustrating day of hunting, D

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: While hunting an elusive deep sea fisherman, Dog is also trying to plan a great Mother's Day for Beth, but he's having problems finding the special flowers Beth wants.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog is hunting a man known as The Godfather of Waikiki. Dog and Beth bailed him out as a courtesy, but now he is refusing to go to court. If Dog doesn't bring him in, it could cost him more than money; he may lose his respect on the street.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog has a big problem. Patty Estabilio has jumped a $15,000 bail bond and disappeared into Hawaii's underworld. Kissing the kids good night, Dog and Beth, with Tim and Leland at their side, plunge into a drug-infused netherworld.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Justin is the low man on the totem pole in the Chapman clan, and this means that the rest of the team is always teasing him. But Justin wants to be a full-fledged member of the team, and Dog has a fugitive that will be his test case.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and his team return to their roots, with a visit to their home town of Denver. Dog and Tim begin the day with an early morning radio show appearance, and it pays off when a listener calls in with a tip about one of the fugitives they're hunting.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Back in Denver Dog discovers that recapturing the past can be more difficult then tracking down felons. On a day of more misses then hits in their fugitive hunting, Dog and Beth repeatedly collide with reminders of their early days.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.desc: Mangalitsa pig breeder Lisa is worried about her boar Hal, who has a large lump on his neck. A famous client brings their dog to the practice. Matt is in uncharted waters as he heads to a local college to operate on one of their fish.

programme.title: Pet Obsessed: Puppies Rule
programme.desc: All pets are great, but puppies rule.

programme.title: Funniest Pets & People
programme.desc: Feeding ducks; eating with a dog; boy dusting off popcorn; boy eating sand.

programme.title: Pet Obsessed: Mischief Makers
programme.desc: The good, the bad and the very, very naughty.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.desc: Peter has a very, very big problem in the shape of one-ton bull Pip. He needs an urgent foot trim but he's reluctant to lie down and allow Peter do his job. One wrong move and Peter could find himself flattened!

programme.title: Dogs On The Job
programme.desc: Any dog that exhibits herding instincts can be trained, and it turns out that herding is a predatory behavior that has been modified from the original predatory behavior through selective breeding of wolves and their descendants.

programme.title: Puppy Love
programme.desc: The cutest puppies. Nonstop.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.desc: Julian returns to Jacki Barlow's alpaca farm to investigate a worrying lump in the mouth of one of the animals. Peter carries out dental surgery on a Yorkshire terrier and Julian examines a pygmy-goat.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.desc: Peter battles to deliver lambs who are jumbled up and stuck inside their mum, and he is shocked by what he finds. Julian has to contend with an angry parrot that has escaped in the surgery. A rescue dog is attacked by another dog.

programme.title: Funniest Pets & People
programme.desc: Zeke catches ball with paws on hind legs; dog shadow boxing; fastest spinning dog: dog spins in circles at record speech.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.desc: When a baby alpaca's life hangs in the balance, Julian performs an emergency blood plasma transfusion on the front lawn of the Thirsk practice. Peter meets a cat with an unusual backstory, but who now has a serious eye problem.

programme.title: Pet Heroes
programme.desc: A Malamute exposes an underground gas leak that threatens a city neighbourhood; a cat takes action when carbon monoxide invades the home of a sleeping family.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.desc: Peter is called out to an emergency at Richard Todd’s farm to help a pregnant Ewe in distress. Peter will have to be quick or else both the lamb and the Ewe will be lost. It will be a race against time to deliver the lamb alive and save mum.

programme.title: Funniest Pets & People
programme.desc: Poodle that twirls all around the house; yellow lab doing bicycle kick; woman walks on table, falls through.

programme.title: Funniest Pets & People
programme.desc: Elvis, a stick fetching, tree-climbing dog that just won't quit; dog scratches back on rocks; sliding on tube straight in the tree.

programme.title: Funniest Pets & People
programme.desc: Dog likes to play piano; dog howls while girl plays the trumpet; baby with keyboard hitting head on wall.

programme.title: Funniest Pets & People
programme.desc: Squirrel looking for something in grass; the dog pulls out the ice from the ice-hole; snowman falls on dog.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.desc: Julian operates on a French Bulldog that has injured one of his 3 legs. Matt Smith rushes to a farm to try and save a ewe and her unborn lamb. Elsewhere, Peter and Shona have some donkey work to do at the Greens' farm to solve a problem.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.desc: Julian Norton visits the young people putting everything they have into their number-one passion - farming. The programme celebrates the hard work and dedication of four young farmers, as they make their mark on the Yorkshire countryside.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Surrounded by those she loves, Krystle resolves to live; Fallon takes the picture of Blake and the dead man to the morgue, unaware she is being watched; Accusing Blake of killing him twenty-five years ago, Alexis vows to avenge his death.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Interpreting Alexis' vendetta against Blake as a love/hate relationship, Dex tells Alexis he is through being taken for granted by her; Sammy suspects Virginia may not be as naive as she wants people to think.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Krystle agrees to have her operation, but only after Blake signs her divorce papers and living will, to be enacted if the surgery is not a success; Fallon is haunted by recurring dreams of Roger Grimes.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Krystle's operation is unsuccessful and she slips into a coma. Told she will probably never recover, a grieving Blake returns to Denver; Sammy Jo is attacked by an unknown assailant; Dex discovers Joanna is a link to Alexis' controller, Heath.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Fearing that his darkest secret will be revealed because of the search for Roger Grimes's murderer, Blake vows to take the rap to put an end to the investigation; Dex and Sable both go after Heath.

programme.desc: Sammy Jo recognizes Gibson as the man Krystle saw in her nightmares, and Blake vows to protect his family secret with his life; Adam discovers Virginia's secret past; Blake entrusts Dex with documents relating to their family's secret.

programme.desc: Sable tries to convince Blake she is on his side. Dex is attracted by her loyalty; Sammy Jo's interest in Tanner McBride intensifies; Dex attacks Adam after learning he took advantage of Virginia; Joanna becomes jealous of Sable's interest in Dex.

programme.desc: Blake resumes control of Denver-Carrington and fires Adam; Joanna accepts Adam's offer to work for him and Alexis; Zorelli confesses his love to Fallon, but she remains confused by her feelings toward him.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Alexis gets her revenge on Sable when she tells her tankers have sunk; Alexis is devastated when she discovers Dex slept with Sable; as Sammy Jo becomes increasingly fond of Tanner McBride, she is unaware that he is married.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Alexis is emotionally crushed by Dex's affair with Sable; Blake tells Dex and Sable beneath the lake is a Nazi treasure and his father killed Grimes to prevent him from exploiting it; Adam tries to win back Blake's trust so he can spy for Alexis.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Sable unleashes her lawsuit against Alexis; Dex dives into the hidden vault beneath the lake and finds it empty; Zorelli tracks down the uncle of Dominique Devereaux, learning he knows something about Grimes' murder; Alexis leaves for Switzerland.

programme.title: Dynasty

programme.title: Lioness In Exile
programme.desc: Soon after we meet Manyari, Queen of her pride, she does something both unusual and bold. She leaves the sanctuary of the clan with her young cubs and takes them on a dangerous odyssey.

programme.title: EXTRAORDINARY HUMANS
programme.desc: Rick Smith, known for his feats involving the throwing of playing cards. Continuing his quest, Thom meets Brian Jackson with his unique lung power, inflating rubber hot water bottles until they explode.

programme.title: The Cheetah Diaries
programme.desc: It's a flying start for the six female cheetah cubs, as they leave with new handler Tim to be ambassador cheetahs at Bush Gardens in Tampa Bay, Florida. After months caring for the cubs, the Cheetah Outreach team says a tearful goodbye.

programme.title: The Cheetah Diaries
programme.desc: This time in the Cheetah diaries, Chobe, who seemed to be in the running to be the next top cat, contracts a mystery illness. Meanwhile, the cheetah cubs have to be kept in isolation, missing out on some crucial training.

programme.title: Wildest Survival
programme.desc: From brutal cold, to extreme heat, from the ocean depths, to the driest of deserts, this episode showcases some incredible survival stories in the world's most inhospitable environments.

programme.title: The Disaster Diaries 2016
programme.desc: Is 2016 the tipping point towards climate and geological chaos? In the footsteps of the successful 2015, The Disaster Diaries, the 2016 edition is a new kind of natural disaster program.

programme.title: EPIC SAFARI ENCOUNTERS
programme.desc: Kristina continues her stay at the Hide Safari Camp with Sean. Cecil's pride is still in the area scouting for prey. Sean teaches Kristina about elephant anatomy and wild dogs take down an impala and mate right outside camp.

programme.title: Rising Tide
programme.desc: Delve into the impacts on families in the Marshall Islands, Fiji, and the Netherlands as rising sea levels devastate fertile lands and drinking water. Uncover innovative solutions to combat these pressing climate challenges.

programme.title: Peak Antibiotics
programme.desc: We are in a war against really smart bugs. The rise of antibiotic resistance and super-bugs is real. Antibiotics might be the keystone of modern medicine, but in the very near future they'll stop working.

programme.title: Green China Rising
programme.desc: In the war to save our planet's future, the battleground is China: a country fighting a frightening number of environmental battles.

programme.title: Wildest Indochina
programme.desc: Vietnam is the easternmost country of the Indochina peninsula. Around 10% of the world's species live here, with tropical jungles fit to burst with wildlife. But less than 50 years ago, things were very different.

programme.title: Kalahari Meerkats: Episode 3
programme.desc: The Gosa Gang have recently moved to a new home known as Fortress burrow. It is close to the Gosa Dam where a rival family of meerkats live. In the quest for territorial dominance there has been a major meerkat standoff.

programme.desc: Contestants will climb up 4 stories on a hook and ladder with 70 pounds of gear. Contestant must lay in a pit for 2 minutes while scorpions are dropped on them. Contestants will be put on a platform suspended from a crane 100 feet in the air.

programme.desc: Contestants fall out of a speeding helicopter. Contestant must consume 10 live slugs and a shot of cow bile. Each contestant must cross between two buildings by placing three planks in front of them on top of two tight ropes as they walk.

programme.desc: Contestant will be placed on a 20 foot rope ladder. Contestants play a game to determine quantity of food they will have to eat. Contestant must walk across a 12 inch wide and 60 foot long beam suspended 100 feet in the air.

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When four-month-old Ryan Stallings dies under suspicious circumstances, his mother is ultimately convicted of his murder. But months later, new evidence emerges from a startling source — his newborn brother.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 2007, Brian and Beverly Mauck were found dead in their Graham, Washington home. Using a bloody palm print and shoe prints at the scene, investigators focus their attention on Daniel Tavares, who had previously inked a tattoo on Brian's back.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When heart surgeon Darryl Sutorius is found dead in the basement of his upscale Cincinnati home, police assume he committed suicide. Further investigation reveals that his new wife Della has a history of violence and an insatiable desire for money.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: While skeet shooting on a beautiful spring day, Martin Dillon is shot dead. His friend maintains it was a freak accident, but it takes more than 20 years for the truth to surface.

programme.title: Forensic Files: Over and Out
programme.desc: When a pipe bomb rips through a rural home, police have no idea who is responsible. A 9-volt battery and the remnants of a mailing label ead investigators to the man who made the bomb.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In the series premiere of "Forensic Files", the longest-running true crime series in history, a Connecticut flight attendant goes missing. Police suspect her husband is guilty of murder, but can they prove it?

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: For 15 months, a serial killer was strangling prostitutes in Florida, then taunting police by leaving the bodies in plain sight. The only clues were a tire impression and some threads.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1995, the founder of American Atheists disappeared with one of her sons, her granddaughter and $500,000 in gold coins. The police investigated several suspects, including David R. Waters, who worked for American Atheists.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a decomposed body is found stuffed in a barrel, it's easy to presume murder. But the body had been placed in the barrel 30 years earlier. One of the few clues was an address book found along with the body.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: After shooting his victims in the head, the killer staged the scene, placed the incriminating evidence into a plastic bag and tossed it into the river.

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1996, Indiana police identified Richard Alexander as the “River Park Rapist” who assaulted four women that year. Later, DNA analysis casts doubt on his conviction.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 2007, Shamaia Smith disappears from a strip club in East Hartford, CT. Police consider various patrons of the club, but focus on local businessman Kenneth Otto.

programme.title: Forensic Files: Order Up
programme.desc: A man is found dead in his home and his ex-wife has a perfect alibi. To determine time of death, investigators need to know when the victim ate his last meal. An endocrinologist, a forensic botanist and a short-order cook answer their question.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a dry cleaner employee is raped and murdered in her store, police turn to forensic science for the answers they need.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a hit-and-run boating accident caused the death of a popular young man, investigators faced the daunting task of searching for one boat among 1200 others.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1993, 82-year-old Kathryn Bishop was found dead in her Pennsylvania home. Tiny clues on the victim's body would tell police what happened that night.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1987, the death of Crystal Purcell was considered an accident. Then in 2001, Barbara Purcell called police to suggest that her estranged husband had killed Crystal.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In little more than a month, two women who lived in the same apartment complex were brutally murdered. The similarities of the crime scenes led police to conclude they were dealing with a serial killer who harbored an intense hatred of women.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The medical examiner ruled the death an accident, but the detectives investigating the case thought the evidence at the scene indicated otherwise.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Armed with little else, police hoped that shoe impressions found at a Lansing, Michigan crime scene would put their investigation of Audrey Nichols' murder back on track.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 2003, St. Cloud teenager Jason MacLennan returned home after a night out with friends and discovered his father's body lying in a pool of blood.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 2004, nursing student Tamika Huston went missing from her Spartanburg, South Carolina home. A tip led detectives to her car, where they found an unknown house key that could help solve the case.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Edward Honaker was convicted of rape, sodomy and aggravated sexual battery and sentenced to three life terms in prison. He maintained his innocence. After years in prison and writing countless letters, he finally found someone who believed him.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When Scott Dunn goes missing, police spray his bedroom with Luminol and uncover a scene of horrific violence. Now investigators face a daunting task: proving that Scott Dunn had been murdered without a body, a witness or a murder weapon.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy learns that Ricky needs a dancer for his Parisian nightclub act and is determined to get the part. Fred offers to teach her how to dance but Ethel arranges instead to have the nephew of the woman who runs the French laundry to give pointers.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Ethel wants Ricky to headline a benefit for her women's club. Lucy will only try to arrange it if she is on the bill as well. After hearing Lucy's terrible singing voice, Ethel is less than eager, but eventually agrees.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy buys a costly dress, and when Ricky tells her to take it back or pay for it herself, she decides to get a job. She answers an ad for a babysitter and finds herself in charge of high-spirited twin boys who are to appear in an amateur contest.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy's neighbor Miss Lewis has a crush on Mr. Ritter, the local grocer but istoo shy to invite him to dinner. Trying to play Cupid, Lucy invites him for her but he gets the idea that Lucy has fallen for him. Apparently Mr. Ritter is fond of Lucy as well.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: In a deception planned to convince Ricky that she ought to be in his new nightclub act, Lucy pretends to have a nervous breakdown. She consults a book on abnormal psychology that reveals three complexes she assumes.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy decides to break into show business by writing a play about a Cuban tobacco picker and entering it in her women's club play competition. Of course she wants Ricky to star in it but he refuses.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: The Mertzes enjoy an evening singing around the piano with the Ricardos in their apartment. When they retire for the night and Lucy and Ricky continue singing, Ethel phones them demanding quiet.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Ricky needs a ballet dancer and a burlesque comic for his club's new musical revue. Lucy wants the ballet gig and takes dance lessons from a strict instructor. Learning the disciplined art is much more difficult than she imagined.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Peggy, a teenage neighbor, breaks up with her boyfriend Arthur because she is infatuated with Ricky. Lucy tries to help the clumsy schoolboy learn how to dance in order to win back Peggy's affections. To complicate matters more, Arthur falls for Lucy.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy and Ethel are eager to get a closer look at the belongings of the O'Briens, new neighbors in the building. They snoop around in their apartment while they are away and when they hear the O'Briens return, Lucy is trapped in the closet.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: After the Mertzes have a quarrel the Ricardos try their best to get them back together. Lucy invites each of them to dinner without the other knowing. The Mertzes finally reconcile but in the process, the Ricardos squabble.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy hates the mustache that Ricky grows for a potential movie role and demands that he shave it off. When he refuses, Lucy gets a fake beard and glues it on her face. To teach Ricky a lesson, she kisses her husband with the beard on when he arrives home.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: When Ricky forbids Lucy from gossiping, she tapes her mouth shut but reveals the latest rumor to Ethel through charades. However, it seems it's the proverbial black pot and kettle when Ricky shares with Fred a spicy tidbit about one of his band members.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy and Ethel are tired of their dishpan hands and demand dishwashers from their husbands. They also don't think the Society Matrons League, a club they want to join, would approve. Their husbands believe they have it easy compared to the olden days.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: A close inspection of her marriage license convinces Lucy that she and Ricky are not legally married. Because his name is misspelled on the certificate, Lucy insists Ricky go through the entire courtship and ultimately the marriage ceremony again.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Ricky discovers a wad of cash in Lucy's purse and closet full of strange valuables and assumes they're all her ill-gotten gains. He doesn't realize Lucy has been legitimately collecting for her club's fundraising bazaar.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy feels left out when Ricky's two Cuban friends visit and converse mainly in Spanish. When she learns that little Renita, someone Ricky once danced with, is coming to town, she insists they reunite for a number.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy and Ethel acquire a walk-in meat freezer. In an attempt to save money, they order two sides of beef, not realizing this is a tremendous amount. Hundreds of pounds of meat and $483 later, they must figure out a way to unload the beef.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Ricky is the emcee for a television variety show and Lucy wants to appear in one of its commercials. To prove to her husband that she has screen presence, she removes the inner parts of their TV set, gets into it, and does a commercial as he arrives home.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: As a publicity stunt to further Ricky's career, Lucy pretends she's an exotic princess from "Franistan" who has traveled halfway around the world to see Ricky perform. She books a suite at the Waldorf-Astoria and gets a lot of press attention.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: When Lucy screws up a dinner appointment with Ricky's new boss, Mr. Littlefield, and his wife because she is late, Ricky puts her on a strict time schedule. Later Ricky meets with Littlefield to discuss his possible promotion to manager of the club.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Ricky impresses Lucy and the Mertzes with all the answers to a radio quiz show they are enjoying. He doesn't let on that the reason he knows the answers is that he was present at the taping. Lucy is so impressed that she signs him up as a contestant.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Ricky begins wearing a hat around the apartment because he thinks he's going bald. Lucy thinks he's worrying needlessly but goes to a store that specializes in hair restoration in order to help Ricky feel better.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Ricky tries to get a raise from his boss Mr. Littlefield but he is denied. Littlefield hires another act for the Tropicana and Lucy, Ethel and Fred decide to make sure no one shows up for the opening.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Upset at Lucy's irresponsible spending, Ricky suggests she could change her ways if she had a job. Lucy and Ethel propose switching roles with their husbands for a week; they will get jobs if the men stay home to do all the housework.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Ricky and his band are going on a tour and Lucy wants to go too. She dusts off her old saxophone and goes down to the club dressed in a zoot suit to audition for a spot.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: The Ricardos' eleventh wedding anniversary is coming up and Ricky doesn't seem to be picking up the none-too-subtle hints Lucy is giving. She doesn't realize that Ricky has already made plans to buy a string of pearls at a discount from their neighbor.

programme.desc: The badger; the Siberian tiger.

programme.title: Xploration Animal Science
programme.desc: Vultures' super strong stomach acid and immunity to deadly bacteria.

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu

programme.desc: Lupin's attempt to steal a time machine causes a crazy mishap! Now stuck in ancient Japan, his team and Inspector Zenigata must join forces to get back to their own time. But notorious thief Lupin has enemies everywhere... and everywhen!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #20: Sweet Lost Night
programme.desc: Turns out the Magic Lamp is real, and Lupin's found a way to steal it! But this genie has a price: to grant his wish, she demands half his memories.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #21: The Last Job
programme.desc: Lupin and his companions have their sights on a Japanese cultural treasure, a priceless Buddha statue. But when a mysterious group of ninja thieves get the jump on them, it might just be the gang's last job!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: The Hida Speedway has been completed and Lupin is looking to take top prize at the first race. The race is actually a trap designed by the Scorpion Gang who are intent on killing Lupin and eliminating all criminal competition.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Fujiko has stolen something from a man named Pycal, and he wants it back. Pycal is a magician who is able to shoot flames from his hands, walk on air, and deflect bullets with ease. Lupin goes up against Pycal in hopes of saving Fujiko.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: A boat collision ruins Lupin and Fujiko's quiet boating expedition. They discover a woman named Linda in the other boat just as gunmen on a larger boat attack them.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko successfully pull off a heist; that is until Zenigata manages to shoot Lupin with a tranquilizer dart. Zenigata hauls Lupin off to jail. Despite Fujiko's best efforts, she cannot break Lupin out of prison.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: With the help of some quick gunplay by his partner Jigen, Lupin takes on the world in elaborate heists, classic car chases, and nasty explosions. Fujiko, a buxom redhead with a penchant for betrayal, always gets tangled up in Lupin's capers.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: One rainy afternoon, a man seeks Lupin's help on behalf of a young woman. The woman is actually Fujiko, who is after a diamond known as "The Star of Killamanjaro". The diamond was implanted into the chest of a mob boss.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Three scrolls contain the secret of creating a blade like the Zantetsuken. Lupin wants to steal them as a matter of family pride because his grandfather, Arsene Lupin, stole them back in the 19th century.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Napoleon once owned a deck of fortune-telling cards that are now in the hands of a millionaire known as Mr. Gold. Lupin plans to steal them during Mr. Gold's birthday party, and Zenigata plans to stop him. Lupin succeeds in stealing the mysterious cards.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and the gang aim to steal the blueprints for a new computer. In their way is a man skilled with the machinegun and his hit-man partner named Poon, who used to be Fujiko's partner in the past.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and Baron Ukraine are both after the world's most skilled counterfeiter. Lupin would have no problem beating the Baron, but the Baron has hired a man called Flinch along with Fujiko and gave them instructions to kill Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Someone is posing as Lupin and blowing up bridges, causing a lot of damage and injuries. Lupin and Jigen discover that the bomber is trying to force an armored car to travel along a route of his choosing.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and Baron Ukraine are both after the world's most skilled counterfeiter. Lupin would have no problem beating the Baron, but the Baron has hired a man called Flinch along with Fujiko and gave them instructions to kill Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko are both after the legendary Eye of the Nile emerald. It is going to be a wedding gift presented at a wedding being held on a yacht.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Zenigata has been invited to an international police convention in Europe; his chief wants him to go, but Zenigata does not want to since Lupin has declared that he will steal a gold bust within the next three days.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1

programme.title: Great Games

programme.title: Great Games

programme.title: Great Games

programme.title: El show de Maury

programme.title: El show de Maury

programme.title: El show de Maury

programme.title: El show de Maury

programme.title: El show de Maury

programme.title: El show de Maury

programme.title: El show de Maury

programme.title: El show de Maury

programme.title: El show de Maury

programme.title: El show de Maury
