programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Nami, Chopper, and Brooke keep trying to evade Jora and win back the Sunny even though it's been turned into a piece of art! In the Colosseum, Don Chin Jao finally faces Luffy - whose power will prove greater?

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy stands along against Don Chinjao, and learns about the old grudge he bears against Garp! Meanwhile, Usopp and Robin get swept up in the Tontatta Kingdom's raid against the royal family, and Franky learns the eerie secret of Dressrosa.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The Tontatta Kingdom gears up for its all-out assault on the Doflamingo Family, as Usopp and Robin are caught up in the war effort! Meanwhile, Franky arrives the headquarters of the toy movement where he finds Zoro, Nami & the others are cornered by Jora.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Don Chin Jao's hatred of Garp and Luffy is finally explained, while his battle against Luffy comes to an end. With tremendous power, one of them is squarely eliminated! But is that really the end of the Colosseum battle?

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: With the battle with Don Chinjao long behind him, Luffy advances to the final round! Block-D contender Cavendish, however, takes the chance and pounces on Luffy, who is defended by an unlikely ally! The agenda of Colosseum gladiator Rebecca is exposed.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Rebecca's deep bonds with the one-legged toy soldier are revealed! Her lineage can be traced to the previous ruler of Dressrosa - and her eternal bond with the damaged toy is linked to the violent overthrow of that regime by none other than Doflamingo!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: As Rebecca enters the ring for the battle for Block D, the crowd shows its contempt for her heritage - only to be scolded by an unlikely supporter. Meanwhile, the other Straw Hats start to reassemble to deal with the attack on the Sunny.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Doflamingo recounts for Law the surprising history of the Don Quixote Family, while Nami and the others battle the insane and powerful artist, Giolla! Her ultimate attack renders them incapacitated, and prompts the betrayal of one of their closest allies!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Law is pinned by Fujitora, and Doflamingo has the upper hand! Only the most cunning of tricks could save Law's plan to hand Caesar over to Nami & the others! Meanwhile, the Sunny falls into danger again, & the battle for Block D heats up in the Colosseum.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Law must put himself in harm's way to defend the Sunny and the Straw Hats from Doflamingo's all-out assault! With barely enough time to save the crew, plans change and send the Sunny on a new mission -- but will it be able to get underway?

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Law & Doflamingo are embroiled in a heated showdown which triggers Momonosuke's memories of Doflamingo's cruelty from the first time they met; meanwhile, after a tearful fanboy conversation Zoro finally gets to see Luffy but all eyes are fixed on Rebecca.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Bartolomeo searches the Colosseum for Luffy but stumbles upon the medical center for the losers of the battles in the ring, but is everything at this center as it seems? Meanwhile, Rebecca has to fend off Rolling Logan's vicious bone-crushing grip attack.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The losers of the Colosseum battle who are being held below the infirmary have a surprising person in their midst! But do they have a clue as to their terrifying fate? Meanwhile, the Tontatta Kingdom's history is made clear.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Bartolomeo finally finds Luffy and starts to lead him to Zoro, while the toy soldier begins to tell the heart-breaking story of how Doflamingo cheated the Riku dynasty out of their control of Dressrosa!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: As the toy soldier's story continues, the sad fate of King Riku and his army, and his daughter Princess Viola, is revealed as well as how the people of Dressrosa fell into the hands of Doflamingo. And all the toys in the country share a mysterious secret.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Zoro, Kin'emon, and Luffy are reunited again, but little do they know that their reunion is being monitored by a potential threat! Meanwhile, the battle rages on between Doflamingo and Law as these two powerhouses clash.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Zoro and Kin'emon make a mad dash to save Law but Navy Admiral Fujitora stands in their way, bringing his full power against them. The Navy is in hot pursuit as a ship approaches with unexpected visitors from the past.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: After revealing the horrible history of Dressrosa, Toy Soldier now shares their plan to liberate the Tontatta Kingdom and bring down the Doflamingo Family, Operation SOP. Luffy bumps into a heavily-wounded Bellamy and Bartolomeo

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Usopp and Robin make their way via an underground tunnel dug by the tiny people of the Tontatta Tribe - a tunnel so small in fact, that Franky couldn't fit! Instead, Franky makes his way to the Toy House.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: As the contenders for the battle of Block D dwindle to only thirty, Rebecca has her hands full with the menacing Suleiman the Beheader! All hope seems lost that she can take him down and move on to the finals!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The battle for Block D comes to a shocking end and the winner that emerges from the cloud of dust stuns the audience even more! Meanwhile, Luffy, Zoro, Kin'emon, and Wicka of the Tontatta Tribe are about to reach the lift to the palace.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Viola, aka Violet, once a great princess of the Dressrosa family, shows Luffy & the others a secret entrance into the palace which avoids the use of the heavily-guarded lift. In the palace's Suit Chamber, Navy Admiral Fujitora reveals his plans.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The final round at the Corrida Colosseum finally begins, as Diamante joins the combatants in an all-out struggle to win the Flare-Flare Fruit! As the stakes escalate, can one champion beat the others & snatch the fruit from the Colosseum's newest hazard?

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy and his group continue their ascent towards Doflamingo's inner sanctum, but standing in their way is an executive of the family whose power is so strong moving past him seems impossible! Meanwhile, Cavendish learns the dark secrets of Dressrosa.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: As Operation SOP finally gets underway but as Leo makes the dash to hide the Tatabasco grape in Sugar's fruit basket, Robin calls for an emergency stop to the plan! Meanwhile, Luffy, Violet, and Zoro are stalled by Pica whose sheer size overwhelms them.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Operation SOP is underway and nearing its final stage! But Trebol proves a far stronger guard for Sugar than was expected, so Robin hatches a plan to lure him away. But is there enough time to execute the plan before the ruse is discovered?

programme.title: One Piece

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes

programme.desc: Hugo tiene en sus manos la verdad sobre Manuela, ella se asombra cuando él llega al hospital, no sabe que Alcides tiene un hermano gemelo. Eloísa tiene que dar una explicación sobre una joya.

programme.title: La patrona

programme.title: La patrona

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Wednesday and Pugsley return in tears from trick-or-treating because a neighbor has told them there is no such thing as a witch. Morticia and Gomez plan to prove to the children that they do exist--by summoning a witch to a séance.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Determined to correct the dreadful literature that Wednesday and Pugsley are exposed to, Morticia sets out to create a new literary world. Gomez fears that his wife's first manuscript is so good, that once the publisher reads it he will lose her.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: In need of artistic fulfillment, Morticia takes up sculpting. An art critic views her first endeavor--a three-eyed Gomez statue--and clubs it with his cane. Gomez, who won't have Morticia's heart broken gets a seedy art dealer to buy it.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Pugsley copies one of his dad's old love letters and sends it to his teacher. Miss Dunbar comes to visit the Addams home and confesses to Gomez that no man has ever fallen so in love with her, leading Morticia to pretend to be the jealous wife.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: After Wednesday befriends a new boy her age, Robespierre Courtney, Morticia invites his parents, Mr. and Mrs. Henry Courtney to visit the Addams house for tea. Unbeknownst to them, the Courtney's are hoping to meet a number of the social set.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: There is a neighborhood burglar on the loose, and Morticia has reason to believe it could be Gomez. Morticia decides to probe his subconscious mind for a key to his criminality after she and Uncle Fester discover loot hidden in the storeroom.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia's pet plant Cleopatra gobbles up her favorite photo of Gomez from the family album. When the original photographer is found and asked to make a duplicate picture, it is discovered that he is now with the Department of Motor Vehicles.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Gomez plays host to Don Xavier Molines, a family friend during his childhood in Spain, and his daughter Consuella. Morticia's hospitality is put to the test when Consuella reveals that she has been promised in marriage to Gomez since childhood.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Wednesday's and Pugsley's faith in Santa Claus is shaken, Uncle Fester is chosen to back up Santa in case the real St. Nick is too busy to come. However, Fester-Santa gets stuck in the chimney, so each of the other adults fills in for him.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Fester is so smitten upon receipt of a photo of his love, a bearded carnival lady, that he borrows stamp money to mail her a proposal. Morticia dons a beard and poses as the mother to convince Fester that he will have to work to support a wife.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Because she thinks Fester (Jackie Coogan) and Grandmama (Blossom Rock) are spoiling the children, Morticia (Carolyn Jones) hires a governess. Insulted, Fester paints a white line down the center of the Addams house, dividing it in half.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez see Fester conferring with TV muscleman Jack LaGrann (Jack LaLanne), and think that Fester is planning a television career. However, Uncle Fester confides to Lurch that he has to go on a secret diet and exercise.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez find Grandfather Pegleg's treasure map and summon Captain Grimby. They hope to charter his boat for the treasure hunt. But after meeting the Captain, Morticia is careful to keep the nature of the mission secret.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Ophelia Frump is madly in love with Horatio Bartholomew, the man who has everything, except the truth about her relatives. Morticia, not convinced by Bartholomew, persuades playboy Cousin Itt to stir the embers of his past romance with Ophelia.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Pugsley shocks his parents when he gives up his new atomic reactor as kid stuff and announces that he wants to find his own job. His first try is as a medical assistant to Dr. Bird. He turns up, scalpel in hand, ready to help during an operation.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Grandma Frump (guest star Margaret Hamilton), comes to the mistaken conclusion that her daughter, Morticia (Carolyn Jones), and Gomez (John Astin) plan to pack her off to an old folks home. Actually, they plan to send her to a beauty farm.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia, in order to be part of the National Beautification Program, decides to become a home decorator and offers her services to the neighbors. Next door neighbor, and insurance agent, Joe Digby hires Morticia in hopes of selling them insurance.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Ophelia taunts Uncle Fester into announcing that he is going to join the Peace Corps. Fester feels he's a cinch to be accepted because Gomez plans to pull strings in Washington on his behalf. The entire family agrees to help him study for the exam.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Allyn Joslyn guest-stars as Sam Hilliard, a former truant officer who now heads a private school where Wednesday and Pugsley are enrolled. When Hilliard breaks under the strain of dealing with the Addams children, Gomez buys the school.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Dr. Marvin P. Gunderson is summoned to examine Kitty Kat, the ailing lion pet of the Addams Family. Morticia decides that it is the doctor who needs help. To build his confidence, human members of the family pretend to be ill so he can effect cures.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia's concern that Lurch is overworked leads Gomez to the operating table to assemble a custom-built secondary butler. Lurch lets the robot do all the work and then begins to feel that he isn't needed anymore.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Uncle Fester incinerates the family's stuffed bear with his flamethrower, Morticia reports the accident to the insurance company. Mr. Henson the head of the company, sends his assistant, Mr. Digby, to handle the case.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Lurch suffers from unrequited love over Tiny Trivia (guest star Diane Jergens), Morticia's visiting school chum who only has eyes for show business. The entire family decides to try to turn their stolid butler into a new personality.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Ophelia laments that she has been jilted, Morticia suggests a career as an alternative to marriage. She tries chemistry first (with explosive results) then turns to operatic singing. Cousin Itt is summoned to coach her to stardom.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez decide to keep Wednesday and Pugsley home from school after Morticia sees the fairy tales they have to read. When the truant officer comes to investigate, he is shocked at what he finds.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia calls a psychiatrist after she fears Pugsley is becoming normal after he abandons his pet octopus for a puppy and is seen wearing a Boy Scout uniform, playing with a baseball bat, and helping an old lady cross the street.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Uncle Fester, who has become lonely, convinces Gomez and Morticia that it is time for him to find a bride. He decides to put an ad in the newspaper, looking for love. But things go awry when a door-to-door saleswoman comes by.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: The remaining four teams learn that the destination that they have reached is not a Pit Stop and they are still racing. They search the area shops of a Bei Hei streets for a Travelocity roaming gnome, which they must keep until the leg's Pit Stop.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: In the fourteenth season's finale, the final three teams set off from their Pit Stop at the Bird's Nest Stadium in Beijing, China and travel over 5,000 miles to Maui, Hawaii.

programme.title: The Amazing Race

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Teams struggle to combat the hectic pace of Vietnam and one Team puts their own Race in jeopardy by offering to help the competition.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Teams scramble to spot royalty in the jam-packed streets of Cambodia and one Team monkeys around and breaks the Race's cardinal rule by losing their passport.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Teams sweat it out searching sand dunes for water in the blistering sun and one racer decides to help his competition hoping karma will be on their side in the end.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Teams slide six stories into a shark tank and one racer must conquer her fear of heights to make it through this leg of the race.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: One team musters up the courage to reveal a personal secret to the others, and another Racer breaks down in tears as the stress of the Race mounts.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: The lack of cooperation hinders one team's efforts at an explosive Detour. Also, during the series' first ever Switchback, Teams return to one of the most infamous Roadblocks in the history of the show.

programme.desc: The racers end up knee-deep in Estonian bogs, and two teams are neck and neck in their race to the pit stop.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Tempers flare when one team goes back on their word and a Team spirals into last place when their taxi is stolen by another Team.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: One team decides to take a four-hour penalty when they're unable to complete a Roadblock, and another team dodges intoxicated locals while trying to complete their Detour.

programme.desc: A million dollars is at the final three teams' fingertips as they count out a maddening amount of poker chips and race to see Mr. Las Vegas, who holds the final clue to the one million dollar prize.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Does having a big brain mean you’re the smartest? Find out on today’s countdown as Jungle Jack meets the biggest brainiacs of the animal kingdom, like dolphins, elephants, dogs, sperm whales, chimpanzees and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Once known as the breadbasket of Africa, Zimbabwe is home to some of the most iconic wildlife on the continent. But, drought, poaching, and a lack of resources have left many species fighting for survival.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack heads to Africa and the front lines of this growing threat to see what can be done to save the rhino from extinction. Jack meets the conservationists who are fighting back using every possible option.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Join Jungle Jack as he meets some animals that stockpile food and supplies. Check out the fascinating behaviors of Leaf-cutter Ants, Bears, Leopards, Honey Bees, Camels and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Journey into the bush in South Africa's Zululand with Jack, Kathaleen, and Zulu Nyala's rangers as they encounter rhinos on foot, and see the tactics rangers are using to wage war against poaching.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Come along for an epic adventure to the Amazon jungles in Ecuador and Peru. Pink Dolphins, Anaconda, Caiman, Baby Tapirs and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Countdown to Discovery
programme.desc: Join Jack as he meets up with six of the planet’s most recently discovered animals, like the elusive okapi, adorable pygmy hippo, rare sun-tailed monkey, highly endangered mountain gorilla, the see-through Fijian crested iguana, and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Join Jungle Jack as heads to the frontlines of wildlife conservation and meets the warriors working to save endangered species. Elephants, Rhinos, Bongo, and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Come along for some epic Hanna family adventures like game ranger training in South Africa, babysitting a wombat in Tasmania, trekking with mandrills in Gabon, a horseback safari through Montana and a trip to meet some donkeys in Arizona!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Join Jack as he visits one of his favorite African destinations while enjoying beautiful unspoiled vistas, meeting amazing Masai people, and getting up close and personal with the animal population, including lions, elephants, hyenas, ostriches, and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Big Bear Countdown
programme.desc: Join Jack as he counts down his coolest bear experiences… trekking the elusive spirit bear in Alaska, helping return a grizzly to his home in Montana, and meeting an adorable baby black bear in New Mexico. Plus 7 more amazing bear experiences.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Sometimes, the cause of death does not match the scene of the crime. When an untraceable poison is used to commit murder, homicide detectives turn to forensic toxicologists to follow a killer's tracks and expose a toxic death.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Sometimes when a death seems to be accidental or the result of a tragic accident, it is up to forensic scientists to reveal the deception lying just below the surface.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Some killers choose to hide their victims – And investigators must then rely on forensic examiners to uncover proof of murder – These are just two extraordinary crimes that have made their way into the medical examiner's casebook.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Some people will let nothing stand between them and their goals. In their tortured minds, raw desire replaces all reason, and homicide becomes a convenient means to an end.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Every family has its secrets, and sometimes blood relations lead to bloodshed. When murder becomes a family affair, investigators must turn to forensics to uncover family plots.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: A friendly Midwest lodge becomes the scene of a gruesome double murder. Two men are dead and a safe filled with cash is missing.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: These cases took a decade or more to solve. There's no statute of limitations on murder. As a case turns cold, the clues become scarce, investigators must rely on science to close cold cases.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Bombers, snipers, spree killers: some people don't care who they kill, they just want to hurt innocent people.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: In criminal investigations, a simple clue can provide the missing link by placing a suspect at a crime scene. Dirt left on shoes, tires or clothes, or even a tiny piece of plastic can pinpoint a crime scene.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: A victim usually never foresees danger when the perpetrator turns out to be a friend or a lover. Science and microscopic evidence can unmask these killers and find justice for those who are Loved To Death.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: For homicide investigators, it's a race against time as they track their deadliest foe: a serial killer for whom killing is the only way to feel alive.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: The solution to the most heinous crimes often hinge on the smallest of clues. Investigators must have their eyes trained to find the full story of a murder written in a single scrap of evidence.

programme.title: The New Detectives

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Gunslinger Johnny Drako rides into town and tells the bartender that he is looking for Lucas McCain. After Johnny leaves the saloon, Sweeney hurries to tell Lucas.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A man arrives in North Fork, intending to marry Lou Mallory. The hotel owner looks for a way out from marrying the man to whom her dying father promised her.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: An assassination plot unfolds as four gunmen disguised as cavalrymen enter North Fork. Their target: Sen. Jim Borden. Their weapon: a Gatling gun.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Sharpshooter Marty Blair tries to persuade Lucas to buy Mark a rifle. After Lucas shoots a man during a robbery at the hotel, Mark and Lucas disagree with his character.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Fast-draw artist Wade Randall is in town, bragging of his gun battles with notorious bad men until one of them shows up to challenge his story.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When Lucas refuses to sell his land, Mr. Prescott will stop at nothing to change his mind. He hires men to try to persuade Lucas, but he refuses.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark's careless actions cause the death of a friend. Unable to accept the truth, he blames the rifle and runs away from home. Soon, he is faced with a tough decision.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Nils Swenson takes the marshal's place for a few days while Micah is away. To maintain peace, Nils insists that anyone coming into town must turn in their weapons.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas's self-confidence begins to slip away when he misses an easy shot that could have cost Mark his life.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A murder occurs at a railroad camp and a young Indian friend of Lucas is accused of the killing. When Lucas tries to help the boy, he finds himself on trial.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas and Mark come upon Winslow Quince, a peddler whose wagon has broken down. They help him bring his wagon to North Fork for repair.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Gridley Mau, the son of a man Lucas killed during an attempted robbery, comes to North Fork looking for revenge.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: The first railroad train is coming to the new North Fork station. Onboard is a Japanese nobleman and his servant, visiting the West to learn about the United States.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: At Halloween, rustlers take advantage of the seasonal disguises to raid a cattle ranch. Lucas' faith in his son's honesty is shaken when he hears rumors of Mark being mixed up with the thieves.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark and Lucas run into Micah on the trail and help when the prisoner he is transporting injures his arm. Lucas' life is endangered when a snake crawls into his bed.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: While Mark goes hunting for Old Spike, Lucas goes hunting for his mortal enemy. Lucas is thrown into jail to stop him from murdering his former friend.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas is baffled when the marshal of a neighboring town refuses to hold a gambler who just attempted murder.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark is injured in an accident, leaving his legs paralyzed. At the doctor's suggestion, Lucas and Mark set out on a trek to Mission Springs.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mario Arsatti claims to be an acquaintance of a good friend from Lucas' past. But it's pleasure before business. Mario has been hired to kill Lucas.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas, who blames his wife's death on his father-in-law, refuses to help the old man elude a gang of gunmen.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: The lazy Jackman brother's mortgage has been foreclosed. Unfit for farming, they head to a nearby town. The family patriarch becomes marshal and deputizes his sons.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark and his girlfriend discover that an old hermit is very lonely. Old Tony invites them to lunch and lets them look for arrowheads on a remote part of his land.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas and Mark decide to enter a local turkey shoot to raise money to buy a ranch.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Cattle baron Oat Jackford orders his two cowboys to run Lucas McCain and his son off their ranch.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When Mark gets caught on a mountain ledge, a young outlaw risks his life to rescue him and breaks his leg doing so.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: The notorious Shelton rides into the town of North Fork to take revenge on an elderly Marshal who is now crippled and working for Lucas McCain.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Johnny Gibbs, Lucas McCain's brother-in-law, visits the McCain ranch. Gibbs, a rodeo rider wanted by the law, begins stirring up trouble.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Annoyed by a club member's constant chatter, a man bets him he cannot remain silent for a year, living in a glass enclosure in the club basement.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Adam Grant is trapped in a recurring nightmare, in which he is sentenced to death and executed.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Using the power of mind over matter, Archibald Beechcroft remakes the world to his own specifications.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Following a frantic phone call about a crashed spaceship, two policeman try and determine who among the passengers of a bus at a snowed-in roadside diner is from another world.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: In a future totalitarian society, a librarian is declared obsolete and sentenced to death.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A man and a woman, on opposite sides of a future war, encounter each other in a deserted town.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A plane lands safely, but the pilot, crew and all of its passengers are missing!

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: When a nuclear attack appears imminent, several suburban friends and neighbors fight over control of a single bomb shelter.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: On the road home from the Civil War, a Confederate soldier stops at a burned-out house and gets to know the owner, a recent widow.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Championship pool player Fats Brown returns from the grave for one last game.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: After a poor but ambitious Central American farm worker overthrows his country's tyrannical leader, he believes he sees assassins everywhere. A look in the mirror reveals his most dangerous enemy.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Before he died, notorious gunslinger Pinto Sykes put a curse on hired-gun Conny Miller. Miller returns to town and is challenged to visit the grave of Sykes, despite the curse.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Little Anthony Fremont controls an entire town with his ability to read minds and make people do as he wishes.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A former Nazi SS Captain returns to the ruins of a concentration camp to reminisce and is met by one of his victims.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: The Earth's orbit has been changed, drawing ever closer to the sun and promising imminent destruction.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Confederacy scout Sgt. Joseph Paradine finds a town full of Union soldiers, and an old man who claims he used witchcraft to paralyze them.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Alan Richards plans to build a dam in Africa on a tribe's ancestral land. The tribe's witch doctor puts a curse on him.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Woodrow, a janitor living in the year 1890, accidentally activates a time traveling helmet which transports him to 1962 - then promptly breaks down.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A hobo, clown, bagpipe player, ballerina and military officer are trapped in a huge cylinder.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A gung-ho young soldier gets a new viewpoint on war when he inexplicably changes places with a Japanese officer trying to stop his superior from leading a charge against American forces.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A lonely old woman refuses to leave her apartment for fear of meeting "Mr. Death."

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Paul Radin has invited three people to join him in his bomb shelter.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A vagrant steps into a murdered gangster's expensive shoes and is taken over by the dead man's ghost, who vows to remain on Earth to seek revenge against his killer.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: On a hunting trip, Hyder Simpson and his dog Rip dive into a lake after a raccoon. When he gets home he finds that no one can see or hear him.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Actor Rance McGrew makes TV Westerns for a living, but he's a lousy actor and a worse cowboy. Despite that, each week he "wins" against the bad guys. Finally, the bad guys have had enough and decide to teach McGrew a lesson.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: The senior residents of Sunnyvale decide that the secret to youth is acting young, and in particular playing a childhood game called "kick-the-can."

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Fortune discovers that a piano he bought his wife for her birthday has magical properties - the music that it plays makes people reveal their true essence.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Maggie, Lydia and Elijah help Aaron and Gabriel on a rescue mission; in the chaos, Negan finds himself watching over Hershel; Sebastian coerces Daryl and Rosita into pulling a heist.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Hornsby marches Daryl and troops to confront Maggie at Hilltop; after a harrowing heist, Rosita gets Connie, Kelly, Eugene, and Max to investigate the Miltons; Ezekiel helps hospital patients in need.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Maggie prepares to defend Hilltop and the people of Riverbend against Hornsby; Hornsby hires Leah to kill Maggie.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Daryl and Negan rush to the Commonwealth to stop Hornsby from going after their families; Pamela deals with protestors demanding justice for Sebastian's crimes; Mercer needs Rosita's help to fight a swarm.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Carol makes a deal with Pamela to wipe the slate clean on behalf of her friends; Aaron, Jerry, Lydia and Elijah get on the road to Oceanside to fill them in on a plan; the Commonwealth celebrates Founders Day.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Eugene goes on the run after the Founders Day incident; Pamela tasks Mercer to investigate his whereabouts, to Max and Princess' dismay; Aaron, Jerry, Lydia and Elijah encounter an unusual complication at an abandoned Renaissance Faire.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Daryl and Carol investigate the whereabouts of their friends after Pamela disappears them from the Commonwealth; Pamela asks Yumiko to prosecute Eugene on behalf of the Commonwealth.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Separated from their children, Maggie, Gabriel and Rosita track a military convoy to a mysterious destination; Ezekiel, Kelly, Negan and Annie find themselves at a work site; Daryl and Carol follow a train that has taken Connie aboard.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Ezekiel and Negan team up to lead a clandestine labor revolt against the warden; Aaron, Jerry, Lydia and Elijah catch up with Luke and Jules fleeing Oceanside; Eugene stands trial with Yumiko as his defense attorney.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: The Alexandrians and the prisoners head back to the Commonwealth to confront Pamela Milton; a swarm approaches the city.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Daryl and Carol rush Judith to the hospital; Rosita, Eugene and Gabriel search for Coco; Maggie and Negan take arms against Pamela; as the citizens of the Commonwealth deal with the herd, the heroes assemble for one last stand to save their future.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick searches for his family after emerging from a coma; Morgan and Duane help teach Rick the new rules for survival.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick unknowingly causes a group of survivors to be trapped by walkers; Rick must confront an enemy more dangerous than the undead.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick goes back to Atlanta to save a man's life; Lori and Shane deal with the surprise return of someone they thought was dead.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Another group of survivors threatens Rick, Daryl, T-Dog and Glenn, sending Rick's mission to Atlanta awry; Jim becomes unhinged back at camp.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Mientras los hombres de Negan continúan con su ofensiva, Aaron sigue buscando aliados nuevos, pese a que pueda costarle la vida. Daryl y Rosita se enfrentan a un viejo amigo.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Las comunidades unen sus fuerzas en la última batalla contra los Salvadores. Negan ha conseguido entregar a Rick un mapa con instrucciones mapas, para así tenderle una emboscada.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick y su grupo hacen un viaje arriesgado a Washington, D. C. para buscar los artefactos que necesitarán para construir la civilización que él y Carl imaginaron.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Las comunidades se unen para restaurar un puente que facilite la comunicación y el comercio, pero alguien resulta gravemente herido. Además, varios Saviors han desaparecido.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Una desaparición misteriosa pone en peligro los planes para el futuro de Rick y divide al grupo mientras construyen un puente.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: La visión de Rick de un futuro civilizado se ve amenazada por un cúmulo de traiciones y agravios pasados que nunca fueron vengados ni perdonados.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick se ve obligado a enfrentar el pasado en su intento por proteger a las comunidades y el futuro que Carl y él concibieron.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Seis años después de la desaparición de Rick, un grupo recién llegado a Alexandria, liderados por la temperamental Magna, genera problemas a los habitantes de la comunidad.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Eugene está solo y en peligro, perseguido por una horda de zombis que, aparentemente, hablan. Mientras tanto, Michonne guía al grupo de Magna hasta Hilltop, donde esperan ser aceptados como nuevos miembros de la comunidad.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Daryl, Jesus y Aaron encuentran a Eugene, pero la horda de zombis parlantes los persigue incansablemente. Entretanto, en Alexandria, Negan escapa de su confinamiento porque a Gabriel se le olvida cerrar la puerta de su celda.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Los grupos individuales están convencidos de que pueden construir un futuro mejor por separado, pero la pérdida de un miembro los lleva a unir fuerzas. Se revela una amenaza perturbadora y peligrosa.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Daryl libera a Henry porque le estaba contando demasiadas cosas a Lydia y, después, interroga a la adolescente sobre su grupo. Entetanto, el grupo de Magna desobedece a Tara y se adentra por la noche en el bosque en busca de Luke.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: El grupo de salvajes que lidera Alpha ataca Hilltop para recuperar a su hija. Mientras tanto, una misión en busca de suministros se convierte en una lucha entre la vida y la muerte.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Henry encuentra a Lydia, pero Beta, la mano derecha de Alpha, lo captura. En Alexandria, Michonne discute con el consejo si deben participar en la feria con el resto de las comunidades.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: An Army sergeant's letter to President Grant sends agents West and Gordon to a lonely outpost to fight a gang of terrorists.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: A tempestuous diva becomes involved in a New Orleans puzzle when kidnappers attempt to abduct her during a singing performance.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: An assignment to take possession of a priceless diamond for the National Museum takes James West to an eerie island estate.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Secret agent West aids a Russian prince in recovering an all-important icon, sought also by a desperate, dangerous enemy.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Agent James T. West is exposed to a deadly plague when he tries to rescue a governor's daughter from a band of stagecoach robbers.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: The board of directors of a corporation owned by a spinsterish tycoon appears to be the target of an insidious plot.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Masquerading as a polished gunfighter with a dishonorable discharge from the Army, James T. West arrives in Quemada, New Mexico, in a plush private railroad carwith orders from President Ulysses S. Grant to quell the terrorist activities.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Jim West and Artemus Gordon match wits with an arch-criminal of grandiose ambitions that plans to reclaim the empire of Mexico and establish himself as a new Napoleon.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Dr. Loveless, a dwarf, watches his giant assistant, Voltaire, subdue a dock guardas he (Loveless) pre-pares to kill disembarking Prof. Neilsen, arriving to present his formula for a new explosive to the U.S.government.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Four men, aided by a guard named Foxx, gain entrance to the U.S. Mint in Carson City and connect a hose to a street gaslight in order to asphyxiate three workers.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: A man from the Attorney General's office in Washington is killed while attempting to take the wanted John Avery into custody, so secret agent James T.West is assigned to the task.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Traffic on the lower Mississippi River has come to a virtual standstill because of the marauding tactics of a blind pirate leader and his cutthroat gang.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: James T. West is blamed for an impending international crisis when a quantity of priceless 'franconium,' a substance of fantastic power and owned by France, is stolen from under his nose at the French Consulate.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Secret agents James T. West and Artemus Gordon determine to track down a missing Albanian princess when the regal young lady they have been guarding turns out to be an impostor.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: This Old House goes Hollywood with the first-ever renovation project in the Los Angeles area. The homeowners plan to renovate their 1933 Spanish Colonial Revival house while keeping its character.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: Norm Abram and Kevin O'Connor stop by one of LA's movie studios to find homeowner Kurt Albrecht at work. In the basement, Richard Trethewey reviews the heating and cooling systems being installed.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: Kevin arrives at the L.A. house to find the custom tiles, windows, and doors. In Griffith Park, Richard sees L.A.’s new water supply infrastructure. Alfonso evaluates the condition of our stucco.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: Norm wrestles with creative details. The stucco system starts on the addition. Kevin sees California modern architecture. Norm shows a formaldehyde-free batt insulation. Kevin meets a tile specialist.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: Custom foam forms and the "cat face" plaster technique replicate existing detail in the house. Norm visits cabinetmaker Larry Buckland. The existing roof on the main house will have to be replaced.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: Alfonso shows Kevin the last two steps of the stucco system. We see the house’s new period-appropriate ornamental ironwork. The reproduction tile for our project is hand-glazed and goes up inside.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: The 1930s floors are matched with red oak and walnut. The new back terrace, with corbels and tile, is constructed. We see attractive low water plants. Kevin gets a close look at the Hollywood sign.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: Kitchen cabinets, soapstone countertops, an archway, and a coved ceiling are installed. Richard helps with a pedestal sink. The Juliette balcony and decorative iron balustrade are installed.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: A new custom garage door blends with the period of the house. The front gates are installed. Kevin shows the front yard, hardware, and light fixtures, then visits a spectacular Spanish style house.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: Work on the Los Angeles project wraps up with the finishing touches both outside and in. We reveal the space and landscaping. The family congratulates everyone on a job well done.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: TOH TV heads to Bedford, MA, to check out their new project: a colonial-era home. The Homeowners plan to preserve the historic part of the house while adding space and amenities with two additions.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: Roger transplants shrubs and plants from the front. Kevin and Norm remove the front entry porch and clapboards. Tom shows the layout for the new addition. Roger sets up a drain and sump pump system.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: Tom and Mark open up a hole in the old fieldstone foundation. Historic sashes are taken off for rehab. Richard sees the oldest flag in the country. Tom forms the new addition’s foundation out of ICFs.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: Kevin finds the walls of the entry addition framed up. Tom creates the connection to the main house. Mark repairs the chimney and the kitchen fireplace gets removed. Norm revisits the Acton Project.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: Jenn Nawada shows the landscape plan. Roger removes invasive vines and brambles. Tom raises a new gable wall. Kevin repairs a historic window sill. Norm and Kevin demo the ceiling.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: Kevin explains the benefits of using OSB sheathing. Tom removes a cast iron pipe obstructing structural beams. Norm sees our historic window sash repaired. Tom takes down the old wall of the ell.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: Tom adds insulation to the oldest part of the house. Roger gets a lesson in building a cook's garden. Jenn and Roger build raised beds out of old fieldstone. Tom waterproofs the new roof.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: Tom replaces a rotted post. Restored historic window sashes are installed. The garage's electrical service is upgraded. Kevin shows the kitchen's inspiration. Tom removes reveals historic boards.

programme.title: This Old House

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Larry discovers an answered magazine quiz and he and Jack think one of the girls wants to have an affair with Jack. They take the girls on a weekend trip to find out who answered the quiz so Jack can talk her out of it.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Jack receives $1,000 by mistake from an automated cash machine. He hides it in the couch for the weekend but when the Bank Security arrives to collect the money, it is nowhere to be found.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Jack writes a nasty letter to a famous food critic, thinking the critic is going to give his bistro a ruinous review. When the critic assures Jack the review will be favorable, Jack tries to retrieve the letter from the critic's desk.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Jack is dating a sex therapist who has asked him to keep her job a secret. Janet, concluding she is a prostitute, is nasty to her and no one can understand why - especially when Janet's own father has become so friendly with her.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Jack has two dates, so he talks Larry into posing as him and spending the day with his unwanted date, Janet's childhood friend, who is visiting from out of town.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Jack believes he has won a baking contest that is open only to women. Disguised as "Grandma Tripper," he goes to collect the check and learns that he is a finalist and must bake his cookies for the company's executives to win the prize.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Jack's father visits unexpectedly and resumes his good nature meddling. Jack explodes and tells him to stay out of his life, but when he learns his father has lost his job, Jack gives him the opportunity to be useful.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Terri is up for a promotion and tells Dr. Kenderson she is married to ward off his advances. When he invites himself and his wife over for dinner, Jack poses as Terri's husband while Janet and Larry pose as French-speaking house guests.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: When Jack attends a charity ball with a socialite and loses $15,000 gambling, Larry and the girls attempt to help him recover the money.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: The girls flip over a handsome Englishman who moves in next door, but Jack and Furley become convinced that he is one of London's most sought after criminals.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Janet is thrilled with her new job as an aerobics teacher, and her new boss Tina is thrilled with Jack. When Tina blackmails Jack into being at her beck and call, Larry offers to take her off Jack's hands.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Jack meets an old flame at the park who is seeking advice about her jealous husband. Furley joins them, and they all get poison oak. Later, at Jack's house, Furley tells the husband they were all in the bushes together.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Jack and Furley get locked in a freezer together. Convinced they are going to die, they have a heart-to-heart talk, and Jack confesses that he really isn't gay. Once safe, Jack worries because Furley knows the truth about him.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: The trio plants a stray cat at Furley's door, hoping he'll bend his rules and keep it. When a girl appears looking for her kitten, Furley lies and says he took it to the pound; so Jack and the girls search the pounds and bring home three different cats.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: After a night on the town with his old navy buddies, Jack discovers he has a tattoo on his derriere. When Jack goes to the hospital to have it removed, Janet thinks he is having a vasectomy and Furley thinks he is having a sex change.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Jack offers to model for a beautiful art teacher and finds himself nude in front of her classroom when Furley walks in. Jack begs Furley not to tell, but the secret is out when a nude portrait of Jack appears at the Regal Beagle.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Jack borrows Janet's new car to drive a gorgeous model to a photo session and totals the car on the way home. He pretends to have amnesia in the hospital, but Janet gets suspicious and concocts a plan to help him regain his memory.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: A customer of the flower shop names Janet in his will, and she receives a vase. His nephew, Philip, an art collector, visits Janet, and Jack thinks he lied about the value of the vase and is trying to get it back.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Jack meets an attractive stewardess, Vicky Bradford; but between her father and her dates, she doesn't seem to have time for Jack. Janet announces her engagement to Philip, while Jack is jealous and lovesick.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Jack thinks Vicky wants a job in Houston and encourages her, causing her to think he wants to end their relationship. She interrupts Janet's wedding to find out why. They make up and the ceremony resumes. Jack proposes and is stunned by Vicky's refusal.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Vicky explains that she is afraid of marriage and suggests to Jack that they live together. Jack reluctantly agrees. They are toasting their first night together in their new apartment when they are interrupted by Mr. Bradford.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: In order to convince their landlord, Mr. Roper, that there is nothing going on between them and their new male roommate, Chrissy and Janet tell him that Jack is gay.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Chrissy's visiting mother, not knowing that the girls have rented the spare room to Jack, causes havoc when she decides to spend the night with them.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Roper feels convinced that his niece will be safe going out with Jack, and Jack would rather be with Janet and Chrissy celebrating Janet's birthday, until he sees the niece.

programme.title: Three's Company

programme.title: Three's Company

programme.title: Bernard Hopkins vs Kelly Pavlik
programme.desc: On October 18th, 2008 Bernard Hopkins fought Kelly Pavlik at the Boardwalk Hall in Atlantic City ending in a unanimous decision victory for Hopkins.

programme.title: Roy Jones Jr vs James Toney
programme.desc: On November 18th, 1994, Roy Jones Jr fought James Toney for the IBF Super Middleweight Title at the MGM Grand in Las Vegas. Jones displayed his exceptional athleticism and speed, outclassing Toney to win a unanimous decision victory.

programme.title: Bernard Hopkins vs Oscar De La Hoya
programme.desc: On September 18th, 2004, Bernard Hopkins fought Oscar De La Hoya for the undisputed world middleweight title at the MGM Grand in Las Vegas. After a quiet first eight rounds, Hopkins finished De La Hoya with a brutal body shot in the ninth round.

programme.title: Roy Jones Jr vs Percy Harris
programme.desc: On December 5th, 1992 Roy Jones Jr. fought Percy Harris for the WBC Continental Americas Super Middleweight title at the Trump Taj Mahal in Atlantic city with Jones defeating Harris in the 4th round by technical knockout.

programme.title: Miguel Cotto vs DeMarcus Corley
programme.desc: On February 26th, 2005 Miguel Cotto fought DeMarcus Corley for the WBO World Super Lightweight title at the Coliseo Ruben Rodriguez in Bayamon with Corley going down twice in the 5th round securing the technical knockout victory for Cotto.

programme.title: Roy Jones Jr vs Thomas Tate
programme.desc: On May 27th, 1994 Roy Jones Jr. went up against Thomas Tate in a 12 round bout for the IBF World Middleweight title that ended in the second round by technical knockout giving Jones Jr. the win.

programme.title: Miguel Cotto vs Shane Mosley
programme.desc: On November 10th. 2007 Miguel Cotto fought Shane Mosley at Madison Square Garden in New York City for the WBA World welterweight title in a full 12 round bout that ended in a unanimous decision victory for Cotto.

programme.title: Roy Jones Jr vs Julio Ceasar Gonzalez
programme.desc: On July 28th, 2001 Roy Jones Jr and Julio Ceasar Gonzalez battled for IBA, IBF, IBO, WBA and WBC World Light Heavyweight titles at the Staples Center in Los Angeles resulting in a win for Jones with a unanimous decsion.

programme.title: Antonio Margarito vs Miguel Cotto 1
programme.desc: On July 26th, 2008, Antonio Margarito fought Miguel Cotto for the WBA World Welterweight Title at the MGM Grand in Las Vegas, in a very close and entertaining fight.

programme.title: Shane Mosley vs Oscar De La Hoya
programme.desc: On June 17th, 2000 Shane Mosley faced Oscar De la Hoya for the first time for the IBA and WBC World welterweight titles at the Staples Center in Los Angeles the bout went a full 12 rounds ending with a split decision win for Mosley.

programme.title: Tyson Fury vs Deontay Wilder 3
programme.desc: On October 9th, 2021, Tyson Fury fought Deontay Wilder in their third and final matchup against each other at T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas. In a thrilling fight, Fury once again proved his dominance, defeating Wilder by an 11th-round TKO.

programme.title: Felix Trinidad vs Oscar De La Hoya
programme.desc: On September 18th, 1999 Felix Trinidad and Oscar De La Hoya faced eachother for the IBF and WBC World welterweight title at the Mandalay Bay Resort in Las Vegas that ended in a majority decision win for Trinidad.

programme.title: Shane Mosley vs Oscar De La Hoya 2
programme.desc: On September 13th, 2003 Shane Mosley and Oscar De La Hoya battled for a second time for the IBA, WBA and, WBC Super welterweight titles at the MGM Grand in Las Vegas in a bout that lasted 12 rounds continuing the reign of Mosley securing his win.

programme.title: Kelly Pavlik vs Jermain Taylor 2
programme.desc: On February 16th, 2008 Kelly Pavlik faced Jermain Taylor for a second time at the MGM Grand in Las Vegas the 12 round bout resulted in a unanimous decision win for Pavlik.

programme.title: Floyd Mayweather vs Carlos Alberto Ramon Rios
programme.desc: On February 17th, 1999, Floyd Mayweather fought Carlos Rios for the WBC Super Featherweight Title in Grand Rapids, Michigan. Rios was a tough opponent for Mayweather, but Mayweather prevailed and showed out in front of his hometown, winning by UD.

programme.title: Manny Pacquiao vs Timothy Bradley III
programme.desc: On April 9th, 2016 Manny Pacquiao faced Timothy Bradley for the third time at the MGM Grand in Las Vegas for the WBO International Welterweight title in a 12 round bout Bradley went down in round 7 and 9 resulting in a success for Pacquiao.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: Fans previously witnessed the rise of The Beast as the new WOW World Champion. The Born Legend, Tessa Blanchard plots to get the championship belt back by partnering with The World’s Greatest Attorney, Sophia Lopez.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: Fans previously witnessed the rise of The Beast as the new WOW World Champion. The Born Legend, Tessa Blanchard plots to get the championship belt back by partnering with The World’s Greatest Attorney, Sophia Lopez.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: The Born Legend, Tessa Blanchard’s feud reaches a boiling point after Jungle Grrrl makes it personal. The Fabulous, Lana Star sets the record straight against allegations and brings a surprising new client to WOW.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: The personalities and conflict have been brewing for weeks, making anything possible in tonight’s Six Women Tag Team Match Main Event with no time limit.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: Fans go wild as new WOW Superhero from the beaches of California, Cali Ray makes her debut. The self-proclaimed 'Grits N Glam' duo Jessie Jones and Amber O’Neal secure a rematch against the team they believe cost them the gold.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: The Born Legend, Tessa Blanchard has her aim set on The Beast but firing her attorney, Sophia Lopez creates unexpected obstacles between her and her target.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: The Born Legend, Tessa Blanchard discovers hidden terms in her legal contract with the World’s Greatest Attorney, Sophia Lopez. Ms. Lopez is seemingly playing a final hand by forcing a legally bound Tessa into a match against a deadly mystery opponent.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: Tonight has 'feud' written all over it with two of The Fabulous Lana Star’s past prodigies joining forces to teach Lana and her newest prodigy a lesson. Will the ghosts of Lana’s past haunt her in the ring forever or does she have a plan to prevail?

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: Will the spirit of The Lioness be killed by last week’s attack or will she demonstrate the resolve to continue? Jessie Jones uses the Dixie Darlings and a tactical argument to secure a shot at the WOW Tag Team Championship Titles.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: With Keta Rush injured, can Stephy Slays find a new partner to help end Exile’s reign of brutality? The Psycho Sister’s leader Razor was taken out by a vicious and fiery attack last week.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: Under suspicious and unusual circumstances, The WOW World Tag Team Championship is on the line tonight. Who will walk away with the most prestigious tag team titles in women’s wrestling?

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: Tessa Blanchard finally earns her chance to redeem her loss of the WOW World Championship when she battles The Beast in the Main Event.

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Women Of Wrestling kicks off with the world champion The Beast, the biggest and the baddest phenom of wrestling, as she battles against the number one contender, New Jersey's own Adriana Gambino.

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: On WOW - Women Of Wrestling, you never know who's going to show up! She's fresh, fly and funktastic — Foxxy Fierce makes her in-ring debut against the cold-hearted dissidentIce Cold — and that's only the tip of the iceberg!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's friends are petrified into solid stone statues, but their spirits live on! Their combined souls energize Yugi into a noble fight, but is spirit going to win the duel when Yugi's not drawing the right cards?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi has defeated Noah... but they still can't escape from the virtual world! The real reason behind their entrapment is revealed... as is the true villain pulling the strings!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Kaiba squares off against his stepfather Gozaburo for their final battle, Yugi and friends are attacked by endless hordes of monsters! Their only hope is Noah, but they can't expect help from their enemy... can they?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Time is almost up before the missile's explosion destroys Yugi and friends! Will the Battle City finalists beat the clock and live to duel another day in the stunning conclusion to the virtual world saga!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends arrive at KaibaCorp Island where the Battle City finalists will compete in the ultimate dueling arena! Get ready for the awesome four-person battle royal where any duelist can attack anyone else!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Honor, friendship, revenge... As each duelist remembers what they're fighting for, the battle royal rages on where none of the duelists know where the next attack is going to come from!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey may have fought some of the fiercest fights in Battle City, but has all his training taught him to become an elite duelist? Joey's gonna show what he's made of in the conclusion to the four-man battle royal!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik ensnares Joey in a Shadow Game where each duelist's heart is linked with his monsters... literally! Every time a monster received damage, the duelist feels the pain instead!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik's Helpoemer send Joey's powerful cards to the graveyard before Joey can use them! Running low on cards and life points, Joey's opportunities for staging a comeback are nearly depleted!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey thinks this duel can't turn any worse... but Marik has all the pieces necessary to summon The Winged Dragon of Ra! Can Joey prevent Marik from summoning the Egyptian God Card, or is victory simply not in the cards?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik transforms The Winged Dragon of Ra into its powerful form, the Egyptian God Phoenix! If Joey can't withstand the Phoenix's blazing fire, he'll lose the duel... plus his only chance to save Mai from her mental prison!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the rematch we've all been waiting for! Yugi and Kaiba square off for the first time since Duelist Kingdom in front of thousands of ravenous fans for the right to challenge Marik! It's time to duel!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba has all the monsters necessary to summon Obelisk the Tormentor to finish Yugi off! Though overwhelmed and outmatched, nothing is going to stop Yugi from trying to summon his Egyptian God first!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: When Yugi's Slifer the Sky Dragon clashes against Kaiba's Obelisk the Tormentor, what will happen when two Egyptian Gods fight each other? It's time to find out which Egyptian God is truly stronger!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The clash of the two Egyptian God Monsters releases mystical energies that show Yugi and Kaiba visions of the ancient Egyptian past! What new answers do these images unlock, and what prophecies do they make for the future?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba summons three powerful Blue-Eyes White Dragons, but Yugi has no monsters remaining in his deck! Is losing only a matter of time, or will a long-dormant card from a fallen friend help turn the tide of battle?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba not only controls Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon, but his Final Attack Orders card leaves Yugi with only three cards in his deck! If Yugi loses, he'll have to give up his chance to save the world from Marik's evil!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Tired of Kaiba's insults, Joey challenges Kaiba for third place in the Battle City Tournament! Has Joey mastered enough strategies to take down the top dog, or is Kaiba going to wallop Joey like a pathetic puppy?
